Job Title: Next Generation Sales Academy – Associate Inside Sales (m/w/d)
Job Description: Auch bahnbrechende digitale Produkte verkaufen sich nicht von selbst. Wir bei Dell Technologies möchten jedem unserer Kunden und Partner eine einwandfreie Erfahrung auf hohem Niveau ermöglichen. Diese Erfahrung beginnt mit unserem erstklassigen Technologieportfolio an Produkten, die sowohl Client-Lösungen als auch High-End-Elektronik, Zubehör, Mobilitätsprodukte, Enterprise-Lösungen, Services und Softwarepakete umfassen. Unsere internen Vertriebsteams hauchen unserem Technologieportfolio Leben ein. Sie legen großen Wert darauf, langfristige Beziehungen und ein harmonisches Verhältnis aufzubauen, und nutzen ihre großartigen Kommunikationsfähigkeiten, um unsere Produkte per Telefon, im Internet oder per E-Mail an Kunden zu verkaufen. Komme  ab April 2024 als Associate Inside Sales (m/w/d)  im Rahmen unseres  Next Generation Sales Graduate Programms  in unser  Inside Sales Team  in  München . Hier findest Du eine Umgebung, in der Du Deine besten Resultate erbringen und einen sinnvollen Beitrag zur Gesellschaft leisten können. Was Du bei uns bewirkst Als Associate Inside Sales (m/w/d) erlernst Du im Rahmen unseres Next Generation Sales Graduate Programms von Grund auf alle Vertriebs- und Technologiekompetenzen, übernimmst vom ersten Tag an Verantwortung, profitierst von einer steilen Lernkurve und hast gute Aufstiegschancen innerhalb unserer Vertriebsorganisation. Unser Next Generation Sales Graduate Programm wurde ins Leben gerufen, um die nächste Generation von Vertriebsleitern von Dell Technologies zu entwickeln. Durch ein branchenführendes Trainings- und Entwicklungsprogramm konzentrieren wir uns auf die Entwicklung Talente entlang eines Karrierepfads. Das Next Generation Sales Graduate Programm beginnen Sie mit einem fundierten Vertriebs- und Technologie-Onboarding im Rahmen unseres 6-wöchigen New Hire Trainings und wird über die komplette Programmdauer hinweg mit einem kontinuierlichen Entwicklungslehrplan unterstützt, um die notwendigen Kernkompetenzen zu erlernen, welche für den Aufstieg in eine Inside Sales Rolle erforderlich sind. Diese Rolle ist eine perfekte Gelegenheit für innovative, über den Tellerrand hinausblickende und proaktive HochschulabsolventInnen mit einer Leidenschaft für Vertrieb, Technologie und Akquisition. Deine weiteren Aufgaben umfassen: Identifikation bestehender oder zukünftiger Herausforderungen der Kunden im Enterprise-, Commercial- oder Public-Segment und damit Akquisition neuer Geschäftsfelder zur Steigerung des Umsatzes mit Kunden im zugewiesenen Bereich (Pipeline Aufbau) Durchführung von Outbound-Verkaufsaktivitäten wie Kaltakquise, Lead-Follow-up, Vertriebsqualifizierung und Angebotserweiterung bei neuen und/oder bestehenden B2B Unternehmenskunden Entwicklung von Account Management Fähigkeiten sowie einer effektiven Kommunikation, indem Du neue Absatzmöglichkeiten aufdeckst, die Du an unsere Kundenbetreuer im Außendienst weitergibst Zu den täglichen Aufgaben gehören die Angebotserstellung, die Preisgestaltung, das Asset Management, die Kontaktakquise und die Erfüllung von Aktivitätskennzahlen für ausgehende Anrufe, Termine und identifizierte Opportunities Aufrechterhaltung des Kontakts mit den Kunden, um die Kundenzufriedenheit und die Lösung von Problemen zu gewährleisten sowie die Erweiterung der Präsenz von Dell Technologies voranzutreiben und eine verbesserte Kundenbetreuung durch sofortige Reaktion und Feedback zu erreichen Mache den ersten Schritt in Richtung Ihrer Traumkarriere Alle Mitarbeiterinnen und Mitarbeiter bei Dell Technologies haben einzigartige, individuelle Fähigkeiten. Für diese Rolle solltst Du Folgendes mitbringen: Abgeschlossenes Bachelor- oder Masterstudium in den Bereichen Wirtschaft, IT oder ähnlichen Studienrichtungen (Abschluss innerhalb der letzten 12 Monate oder in den nächsten Monaten) Ausgezeichnete Kommunikations-, Verhandlungs- und Präsentationsfähigkeiten in Deutsch und Englisch sowie die Fähigkeit, in interkulturellen Teams zu arbeiten IT-Affinität, Networking-Skills und die Fähigkeit, mit Veränderungen in einem schnelllebigen Arbeitsumfeld umzugehen Arbeitsmoral und Ergebnisorientierung sowie Eigenmotivation, Lernbereitschaft und Problemlösungskompetenz Wünschenswerte Zusatzqualifikationen: Erste Berufserfahrung im Vertrieb oder verwandten Bereichen durch Praktika und Werkstudententätigkeiten Wer wir sind Wir glauben, dass jeder von uns die Chance hat etwas zu bewirken. Deshalb stellen wir unsere Teammitglieder in den Mittelpunkt unseres Handelns. Wenn du auf der Suche nach einer Möglichkeit bist, deine Karriere mit den besten Köpfen und der fortschrittlichsten Technologie der Branche voranzutreiben, dann bist du bei uns genau richtig. Dell Technologies ist eine einzigartige Unternehmensfamilie, die Einzelpersonen und Organisationen dabei hilft, die Art und Weise, wie sie arbeiten, leben und spielen, zu verändern. Arbeite mit uns an einer Zukunft, die für alle funktioniert, denn der Fortschritt braucht uns alle. Dell Technologies hat sich dem Grundsatz der Chancengleichheit bei der Beschäftigung aller Mitarbeitenden verschrieben und bemüht sich, den Mitarbeiter:Innen ein Arbeitsumfeld zu bieten, das frei von Diskriminierung und Belästigung ist. Die vollständige Richtlinie zur   Chancengleichheit bei Beschäftigung   findest du   hier . Job Description: Senior Principal Engineer, Service Delivery Dell Technologies customers rely on our products and services to drive progress. So, we take the service we provide extremely seriously. Service Delivery is all about making sure our technical solutions help clients fulfil their priorities, challenges and initiatives. Supported network infrastructure for all customer-facing product offerings for external customers. Perform daily system monitoring, verifying the integrity and availability of all hardware, resources, systems and key processes, reviewing system and application logs, and verifying completion of scheduled jobs Strong knowledge on Networking and Switching Configuring and deleting access rules in Firewall and troubleshooting the issues. F5, Palo Alto, Sonic firewall - Configuring and troubleshooting virtual servers, pools, health monitors, SSL profiles, irules, generating CSRs, installing and renewing SSL certs, DNS virtual server for DNS load balancing, radius authentication. Job Title: Small Business Germany, Junior Sales Demand Generation Representative with German (Part-time/Full-time)
Job Description: Junior obchodný reprezentant pre malé a stredné podniky s nemeckým jazykom (skrátený/plný úväzok) *English version available below Portfólio inovatívnych technológií spoločnosti Dell Technologies stačí na to, aby sa vám zrýchlil tep. Naši zákazníci sú však našou srdcovou záležitosťou a zaslúžia si výnimočný ľudský prístup, ktorý je zameraný na ich technologické potreby. Náš tím obchodných reprezentantov Inside Sales je hnacou silou našej spoločnosti a zabezpečuje komunikáciu so zákazníkmi na najvyššej úrovni. Staň sa  Junior  obchodným reprezentantom pre malé a stredné podniky  a pridaj sa k nášmu nemeckému  Inside Sales  tímu v  Bratislave . S dostatočnou dávkou odvahy si môžeš vybudovať dynamickú kariéru, osobne a profesijne rásť a meniť svet naokolo. Ako bude vyzerať tvoja práca? Ako obchodný reprezentant budeš zodpovedný za predaj produktov spoločnosti Dell Technologies našim zákazníkom podľa ich potrieb, zastrešovať akvizíciu nových klientov a prehlbovať existujúce obchodné vzťahy. Naši obchodní reprezentanti aktívne spolupracujú s manažérom a ďalšími členmi obchodného oddelenia. Súčasťou pozície sú aj pravidelné tréningy s koučmi, mentormi, e-learningy a iné možnosti vzdelávania. Tím je priateľský, nápomocný a pripravený poskytnúť novým kolegom maximálnu oporu, aby sa ti na pozícii darilo. Tvojou úlohou bude Komunikovať so zákazníkom o jeho IT potenciáli, objavovať nové obchodné príležitosti Dosahovať predajné ciele Budovať vzťahy so zákazníkmi a zabezpečovať pozitívnu zákaznícku skúsenosť Spolupráca s rôznymi internými tímami Zúčastňovať sa školení, konferencií a iných podujatí o trendoch, produktoch a službách v odvetví Vykroč za prácou svojich snov  S každým členom tímu Dell Technologies prichádza niečo jedinečné. Pre túto pozíciu hľadáme: Požiadavky  Študent vysokej školy alebo ukončené stredoškolské štúdium Skúsenosti s komunikáciou so zákazníkmi alebo predajom Nemecký jazyk na úrovni C1, angličtina je výhodou Zameranie na výsledky Silné komunikačné a prezentačné zručnosti a schopnosť riešiť problémy Výhodou je  Blízky vzťah k technológiám a IT odvetviu. Schopnosť pracovať samostatne aj v rámci tímu. Platové ohodnotenie  od  (plný úväzok):  1100 EUR  mesačne v hrubom (fixná zložka 70%) +  475 EUR  mesačne v hrubom (variabilná zložka 30%). Priemerý mesačný zárobok (plný úväzok)  od  1575 EUR v hrubom. Platové ohodnotenie od (skrátený úväzok): 600 EUR  mesačne v hrubom (fixná zložka 70%) +  260 EUR  mesačne v hrubom (variabilná zložka 30%). Prvé 3 mesiace je variabilná časť mzdy vyplácaná v plnej výške. Súčasťou finálneho ohodnotenia sú aj ďalšie odmeny, o ktorých sa dozvieš viac počas výberového procesu. Uzávierka prihlášok:  29. február 2024 Benefity: Motivujúce platové ohodnotenie a odmeny. Príležitosť kariérne rásť a postúpiť. Súkromná zdravotná starostlivosť, zdravotné a životné poistenie. Platené sick days navyše. Prístup do nášho vzdelávacieho štúdia – obsahuje viac ako 1 000 online školení. Dovolenka navyše.   Súkromná zamestnanecká posilňovňa, kaviareň a kantína. Celý zoznam výhod nájdeš  TU . Kto sme Veríme, že každý z nás môže zanechať stopu. Preto sú naši zamestnanci stredobodom všetkého, čo robíme. Ak hľadáš príležitosť na kariérny rast s najlepšími expertmi a najpokročilejšími technológiami v odvetví, hľadáme práve teba. Dell Technologies je jedinečné zoskupenie spoločností, ktoré pomáha jednotlivcom a organizáciám meniť spôsob, akým pracujú, žijú a zabávajú sa. Pridaj sa k nám a buduj budúcnosť, ktorá bude fungovať pre každého, pretože pokrok si vyžaduje každého z nás. O tom, ako u nás funguje diverzita a inklúzia, nájdeš viac informácií  tu . Spoločnosť Dell Technologies sa zaväzuje dodržiavať zásadu rovnakých pracovných príležitostí pre všetkých zamestnancov a poskytovať zamestnancom pracovné prostredie bez diskriminácie a obťažovania. Úplné znenie zásad rovnosti pracovných príležitostí si môžeš prečítať  tu . Flexibilná a hybridná pracovná kultúra spoločnosti Dell Technologies V Dell Technologies veríme, že za najlepšou prácou sa skrýva flexibilita. Vieme, že sloboda a flexibilita sú pre všetkých našich zamestnancov kľúčové bez ohľadu na to, kde sa nachádzajú. Náš flexibilný a hybridný štýl práce umožňuje našim zamestnanom slobodne tvoriť, inovovať a dosahovať výsledky podľa vlastných predstáv. Ak sa chceš dozvedieť viac o našej pracovnej kultúre, navštív stránku venovanú našim  pobočkám . Job Title: Spécialiste 1, Produit intérieur / Specialist 1, Inside Product
Job Description: Spécialiste 1, Inside Product Dell Technologies est un collectif de visionnaires à la pointe de l'industrie et obsédés par le client. Nous pensons que la technologie est essentielle au progrès humain et que la technologie que nous fournissons transforme notre façon de travailler et de vivre. Mais nous sommes plus qu'une entreprise technologique - nous sommes une entreprise humaine. Nous reconnaissons que plus de 100 000 employés répartis sur six continents ont des intérêts et des aspirations différents. Nous inspirons, stimulons et respectons chacun d'entre eux, chaque jour. Et nous leur offrons des possibilités inégalées de croissance et de développement. Nous avons hâte que vous en fassiez l'expérience en tant que représentant commercial au sein de notre équipe de vente canadienne. Notre organisation mondiale de vente interne est un moteur de vente exceptionnel, créatif et efficace sur le plan opérationnel. En tant qu'organisation mondiale, nous fournissons des capacités de vente évolutives et une portée sur le marché pour générer un pipeline et des revenus massifs, tout en développant la prochaine génération de professionnels de la vente et de la technique de Dell Technologies. Chez Dell EMC, nous sommes un leader mondial de la transformation des technologies de l'information et des entreprises. Alors que les entreprises se lancent dans la transformation numérique, Dell EMC aide ses clients à stocker, gérer, protéger et analyser leur actif le plus précieux - l'information - de manière agile, fiable et plus rentable, quels que soient leur secteur et leur segment de marché. Les vendeurs de Dell Technologies sont connus pour leur passion, leur affinité pour l'apprentissage et leur capacité à obtenir des résultats. Académie de vente nouvelle génération Dell Technologies Sur une période de 2 à 3 ans, vous participerez à un programme intensif qui vous préparera à une réussite à long terme au sein de l'organisation commerciale de Dell Technologies. Tous ceux qui rejoignent notre organisation commencent en tant qu'Associate Inside Sales Rep, où ils reçoivent une formation de premier ordre, tant du point de vue technologique que du point de vue commercial. Vous occuperez ce poste pendant 9 à 12 mois, en fonction de vos performances, puis vous aurez la possibilité d'évoluer vers un poste de représentant des ventes internes, où vous devrez atteindre un quota et gérer tous les aspects d'une campagne de vente. En général, les personnes qui occupent le poste de représentant des ventes internes restent un an et demi avant de passer au poste suivant, qu'il s'agisse de vente sur le terrain, de gestion des ventes ou de vente spécialisée. Nous voyons souvent ceux qui réussissent dans ce programme occuper deux ou trois emplois au cours des trois premières années, tous avec plus de responsabilités, une plus grande contribution et un meilleur salaire. Cette opportunité peut vous convenir si vous êtes - passionné, ambitieux et autonome, capable d'établir des relations positives et d'établir des priorités en fonction de demandes changeantes - un leader doté d'une éthique de travail solide - mature, confiant, fiable et adaptable - Vous êtes capable d'influencer les autres et de transmettre un sentiment d'urgence pour résoudre les problèmes En tant qu'ambassadeur de Dell Technologies, vous proposez des solutions à nos clients tout en défendant le message de Dell Technologies avec conviction et passion Faites le premier pas vers la carrière de vos rêves  Chaque membre de l'équipe Dell Technologies apporte quelque chose d'unique. Voici ce que nous recherchons pour ce poste : Exigences essentielles  Diplôme d'associé ou de bachelier avant la date d'entrée en fonction Passionné par une carrière de vendeur dans l'industrie technologique Solides compétences en communication verbale et écrite Vous devez parler couramment le français. Exigences souhaitables  Un leader avec une éthique de travail résiliente, fiable, confiant, motivé et capable d'être encadré Capacité à influencer les autres et à transmettre un sentiment d'urgence pour mener les problèmes à leur terme La culture de travail flexible et hybride de Dell Chez Dell Technologies, nous pensons que c'est en offrant de la flexibilité que nous travaillons le mieux. Nous savons que la liberté et la flexibilité sont essentielles pour tous nos employés, où qu'ils se trouvent, et notre style de travail flexible et hybride permet aux membres de l'équipe d'avoir la liberté d'imaginer, d'innover et d'obtenir des résultats à leur manière. Pour en savoir plus sur notre culture d'entreprise, veuillez consulter notre page sur les lieux de travail. Rémunération Dell s'engage à appliquer des pratiques de rémunération justes et équitables. La fourchette de rémunération pour ce poste est de 72 765 $ à 82 225 $ CAD.  Qui sommes-nous ? Nous croyons que chacun d'entre nous a le pouvoir d'avoir un impact. C'est pourquoi nous plaçons les membres de notre équipe au centre de tout ce que nous faisons. Si vous êtes à la recherche d'une opportunité de faire évoluer votre carrière avec certains des meilleurs cerveaux et des technologies les plus avancées de l'industrie, nous sommes à votre recherche. Dell Technologies est une famille unique d'entreprises qui aide les individus et les organisations à transformer leur façon de travailler, de vivre et de se divertir. Rejoignez-nous pour construire un avenir qui fonctionne pour tout le monde, car le progrès nous concerne tous. Job Title: Principal Software Engineer - Detection Platform - Secureworks
Job Description: Principal Software Engineer- Detection Platform Team - Secureworks About Secureworks Secureworks (NASDAQ: SCWX) is a global cybersecurity leader that secures human progress with Secureworks® Taegis™, a SaaS-based, open XDR platform built on 20+ years of real-world threat intelligence and research, improving customers’ ability to detect advanced threats, streamline and collaborate on investigations, and automate the right actions. We enjoy competitive compensation and benefits packages, and reward and recognize our employees for exceptional results. A constant focus on continued learning and growth keeps our team members engaged and excited about “what’s next.” We offer flexible work options when available, and emphasize the importance of work-life balance. We know that when our people are rewarded, recognized, and rejuvenated, we win as a team. Role Overview The Detection Platform team builds software which empowers security practitioners to build, maintain, and extend detections to outpace the adversary. We are seeking a highly skilled and motivated Senior Software Engineer to join our Detection Platforms team. You will play a crucial role in developing and enhancing the core detection capabilities of our market-leading XDR solution, working in a fast-paced, startup-like environment with an experienced, cross-functional team of software engineers, data scientists, and security experts. If you love computer security and digging into complex engineering challenges, then we want your help to protect organizations in the digitally connected world! We operate our systems at scale with high availability and elasticity. Our primary tech stack consists of Golang, Kubernetes, Kafka, Elasticsearch, and GraphQL, but we also use tools like S3, ScyllaDB, Redis, SQS and many other AWS services. Minimum Requirements: At least 5 years of software development experience in languages such as GoLang, Java, Scala and a solid foundation in algorithms and data structures A proactive mindset with excellent problem-solving and communication skills Experience with big data technologies such as Apache Kafka, Spark, Hadoop, or similar systems. Preferred Skills: Demonstrated experience with scripting languages like Python, Bash, etc Testing and troubleshooting skills with the ability to walk from UI down to backend services and track where problems are happening Experience developing and deploying production systems with cloud platforms like AWS or GCP and orchestrations systems like Kubernetes Experience working with blended teams of backend and frontend engineers, product managers, and user experience researchers Knowledge of cyber security domain Work Environment We are a remote first team and are geographically distributed across the US, Canada, and UK - we utilize tools to facilitate communication and collaboration like Slack, Google Meet, Google Docs, Miro, and Lucid Charts. We also believe in a strong work-life balance and providing support for team members to accomplish that. We are also a family-first company that values our team members and has benefits and a culture that will help them through important life events, such as caring for family, parental leave, etc. We also value continuing education and skills development through things like internal tech talks, external technical presentations to our teams, and other opportunities for training and education. Secureworks is committed to the principle of equal employment opportunity for all employees and to providing employees with a work environment free of discrimination and harassment. Job Description: Stáž pre VŠ študentov v obchodnom tíme s nemeckým jazykom *English version available below Portfólio inovatívnych technológií spoločnosti Dell Technologies stačí na to, aby sa vám zrýchlil tep. Naši zákazníci sú však našou srdcovou záležitosťou a zaslúžia si výnimočný ľudský prístup, ktorý je zameraný na ich technologické potreby. Náš tím obchodných reprezentantov Inside Sales je hnacou silou našej spoločnosti a zabezpečuje komunikáciu so zákazníkmi na najvyššej úrovni. Staň sa  stážistom  a pridaj sa k nášmu nemeckému  Inside Sales  tímu v  Bratislave , získaj pracovné skúsenosti, ktoré ťa zviditeľnia na pracovnom trhu a zároveň si osvojíš komunikačné techniky v biznis komunikácii v nemeckom jazyku. Ako bude vyzerať tvoja práca? Ako  stážista v obchodnom tíme  môžeš zažiť osobný a profesijný rast v modernom medzinárdnom prostredí. Budeš plnohodnotným členom obchodného tímu zameranom na akvizíciu zákazníkov a predaj hardware a software Dell produktov podľa potrieb zákazníka na nemeckom trhu. Súčasťou pozície sú aj pravidelné tréningy s koučmi, tréningy, priamy kontakt s biznisom, e-learningy iné možnosti vzdelávania. Tím je priateľský, nápomocný a pripravený poskytnúť novým kolegom maximálnu oporu, aby sa ti na pozícii darilo. Tvojou úlohou bude Komunikovať so zákazníkom na nemeckom trhu o jeho IT potenciáli. Budovať pozitívnu zákaznícku skúsenosť. Zastrešovať predaj po administratívnej stránke, pracovať s internými systémami Podpora obchodného reprezentanta v administratíve Zúčastňovať sa školení a iných podujatí a rozširovať si obzor o najnovších IT trendoch, produktoch a službách. Vykroč za prácou svojich snov  Každý zamestnanec Dell Technologies prispieva svojou jedinečnosťou. Hľadáme ambicióznych študentov, ktorí majú chuť rozvíjať svoje obchodné, komunikačné, jazykové skills. Požiadavky  Študent denného vysokoškolského štúdia v SR. Nemecký jazyk na plynulej úrovni (B2/C1). Zameranie na výsledky   chuť sa učiť nové veci. Silné komunikačné a prezentačné zručnosti a schopnosť riešiť problémy. Schopnosť pracovať samostatne aj v rámci tímu. Výhodou je  Znalosť angličtiny (na akejkoľvek úrovni). Blízky vzťah k technológiám a IT odvetviu. Platové ohodnotenie: 5,50 EUR/hod. Uzávierka prihlášok: Výberový proces sa skladá z 3 jednoduchých krokov: Telefonický screening s recruiterom. Osobný pohovor s manažérmi. Spätná väzba / Pracovná ponuka. Benefity: Budeš súčasťou komunity približne 100 stážistov v Dell Technologies Bratislava. Prístup do vzdelávacieho štúdia s viac ako 1 000 online školeniami. Počítač Dell. Rozvojové programy a možnosť kariérneho rastu (po ukončení štúdia prejsť na TPP alebo sa zúčasniť. rozvojových programov pre absolventov). Teambuildingy, záujmové skupiny a dobrovoľnícke aktivity. Kaviareň, kantína, gaming room a gym priamo v budove. Celý zoznam benefitov nájdeš  TU . Kto sme Veríme, že každý z nás môže zanechať stopu. Preto sú naši zamestnanci stredobodom všetkého, čo robíme. Ak hľadáš príležitosť na kariérny rast s najlepšími expertmi a najpokročilejšími technológiami v odvetví, hľadáme práve teba. Dell Technologies je jedinečné zoskupenie spoločností, ktoré pomáha jednotlivcom a organizáciám meniť spôsob, akým pracujú, žijú a zabávajú sa. Pridaj sa k nám a buduj budúcnosť, ktorá bude fungovať pre každého, pretože pokrok si vyžaduje každého z nás. O tom, ako u nás funguje diverzita a inklúzia, nájdeš viac informácií  tu . Spoločnosť Dell Technologies sa zaväzuje dodržiavať zásadu rovnakých pracovných príležitostí pre všetkých zamestnancov a poskytovať zamestnancom pracovné prostredie bez diskriminácie a obťažovania. Úplné znenie zásad rovnosti pracovných príležitostí si môžeš prečítať  tu . Sales internship for German-speaking university students The Dell Technologies portfolio of emerging technologies is enough to get your pulse racing. But our customers are our heartbeat and deserve human interaction that is special and outstanding to their technological needs. Our Inside Sales Account Manager team is the driving force behind our high-level customer interaction. Join us as a  Sales Intern  on our  Inside Sales  team in  Bratislava , gain profound work experience that will strengthen your position in the job market, and develop your business communication and techniques in German. What you’ll achieve As a  sales intern , you will find personal and professional development in a modern international environment. You will be a part of a sales team focused on the acquisition of new customers and sales of Dell hardware and software products in alignment with customer needs in the German market. Take advantage of opportunities such as individual support of our coaches, internal training, direct contact with business, e-learning, and other development opportunities. Our team is friendly and willing to help and support you, so you can thrive at your job. You will Communicate with clients from the German market about their IT potential . Build positive customer experience. Cover administrative tasks connected to sales and work with internal tools. Support sales representatives and help with administrative tasks. Attend trainings and other events to gain deep knowledge of products and services; keep up to date with industry trends and developments. Take the first step towards your dream career Every Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table. We are looking for ambitious students, who are open to developing their sales, communication, and language skills. Essential Requirements Daily university student in Slovakia German language on a fluent (B2/C1) level. Results-driven and willing to learn new things. Strong communication, presentation, and problem-solving skills. Ability to work independently and as part of a team. Desirable Requirements English proficiency (on any level). Affinity  for IT technology.  Salary:  5,50 EUR per hour Application closing date:  The hiring process contains just three easy steps: Phone screening with a recruiter. Personal interview with the manager/s. Feedback / Job Offer. Benefits You will become a member of a community of around 100 interns at Dell Technologies Bratislava. Access to Learning studio with more than 1,000 e-learnings. Dell laptop. Development programs and career growth opportunities (you can become a full-time employee after graduation or join one of our graduate development programs). Teambuilding, employee resource groups, and volunteering activities. In-house employee canteen, cafe, gaming room, and gym. To see the full list of benefits, click  HERE.   Who we are We believe that each of us has the power to make an impact. That’s why we put our team members at the center of everything we do. If you’re looking for an opportunity to grow your career with some of the best minds and most advanced tech in the industry, we’re looking for you. Dell Technologies is a unique family of businesses that helps individuals and organizations transform how they work, live and play. Join us to build a future that works for everyone because Progress Takes All of Us  here . Graduate Technical Support - French Speaker At Dell Technologies, world-class service doesn’t end when a customer purchases our innovative products. Our Technical Support team is there for them whenever they need help – by phone or email, online and on social media. No matter how complex the challenge, we rise to it. We answer questions about the installation, operation, configuration, customization and use of Dell Technologies products. For critical matters, we use our systems to provide remote diagnostic technical support. If there’s an issue with a customer’s product, we’ll analyze it, identify the cause, recommend a solution and document the problem. Join us as a  Senior Technician  on our  Product Services  team in  Casablanca, Morocco  to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact. What you’ll achieve As a Senior Technical Support Technician, you will work with highly skilled technical advisors to develop and deliver solutions that enable customers to maximize returns on IT investments, drive efficiencies and reduce costs. You will: • Solve complex problems for customers and be on top of ambitious expectations • Partner closely with customers while communicating proactively regarding overall progress of queries • Exhibit first-class customer service • Drive operational excellence through quality closures and efficient management of issues • Have the opportunity to mentor and coach other team members Take the first step towards your dream career Every Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table. Here’s what we are looking for with this role: Essential Requirements • Fresh Graduate with a Bachelor Degree or equivalent • World-class customer service, phone etiquette and work ethic • Ability to excel under pressure • Strong problem-solving and trouble-shooting skills using operational and diagnostic procedures Desirable Requirements • Experience with job-associated databases or software Dell’s Flexible & Hybrid Work Culture At Dell Technologies, we believe our best work is done when flexibility is offered. What you’ll achieve As a  Software Engineer Intern , you will j oin the team in a hands-on role and use modern development methodologies . Job Title: 2024 校园招聘 企业渠道客户经理
Job Description: 2024  校园招聘   企业渠道客户经理 即使在数字领域具有开创性的产品也不能做到自我销售。在戴尔，我们下定决心要为每一个客户及合作   伙伴提供高品质的一流体验。这种体验首先从我们开创性的技术产品组合开始，即客户端解决方案、高端电子设备、配件、移动产品、企业解决方案、服务和软件包。内部销售团队为我们的技术产品组合注入了活力。开发持久的关系、建立和谐的环境并依靠自身完美无瑕的交流技巧，通过电话、 Web 和电子邮件向客户销售产品，这是该团队引以为傲的资本。 欢迎加入我们 [ 厦门 ] 的 [企业客户经理] 在 [ 内部销售 ] 团队，您将与业界顶尖的人员一同共事并产生深远的社会影响。 内部销售实习生将运用他们的交流技巧与行业知识，通过电话、 Web 和电子邮件向客户销售公司产品与服务，推动与合作伙伴的合作，最终实现产品解决方案的销售。 关键职责： ·         学习团队合作以及跨部门沟通相关技能，了解和学习世界 500 强企业领先的管理方式、业务模式和跨团队协作技能。 ·         学习 IT 前沿技术。包括但不限于： IT 数字化转型，云计算、大数据、人工智能，现代化数据中心基础架构等先进解决方案，学习主流解决方案。 ·         提供客户开发至客户维护技能学习；优质的企业培训资源，帮助在时间管理、技能提升、职业规划管理上不断提升 ·         管理客户信息，并通过电话和电子邮件等多种方式与客户建立联系，通过沟通来挖掘客户业务机会 ·         通过团队合作赢取客户订单，并协调订单的交付，学习销售策略，掌握销售流程。 基本要求： ·         良好的沟通能力和学习能力 ·         对销售岗位高度热忱 ·        2023 和  2024  届本科及以上学历优先 我们是谁： 我们相信，我们每个人都有能力产生影响。这就是为什么我们将团队成员置于我们所做的一切的中心。如果您正在寻找机会与业内最优秀的人才和最先进的技术一起发展您的职业生涯，我们正在寻找您。   戴尔科技集团是一个独特的商业集成，可帮助个人和组织转变工作、生活和娱乐方式。加入我们，建立一个适合所有人的未来，因为进步需要我们所有人。 截止日期：2024年  6月  30日 戴尔科技集团致力于为所有员工提供平等就业机会的原则，并为员工提供没有歧视和骚扰的工作环境。阅读完整的平等就业机会政策请点击 这里 。 Job ID: R228479 Dell’s Flexible & Hybrid Work Culture At Dell Technologies, we believe our best work is done when flexibility is offered. We know that freedom and flexibility are crucial to all our employees no matter where you are located and our flexible and hybrid work style allows team members to have the freedom to ideate, be innovative, and drive results their way. To learn more about our work culture, please visit our  locations  page.

Estagiário de Operação de E-Commerce Você é apaixonado por otimizar os aspectos operacionais do e-commerce e apoiar uma equipe dinâmica? Convidamos você a se juntar à nossa equipe de e-commerce. Neste papel, você desempenhará um papel crucial em um dos maiores e-commerces do Brasil.  O QUE VOCÊ CONTRIBUIRÁ    Como  Estagiário de Operação de E-Commerce , você se envolverá ativamente em várias tarefas operacionais relacionadas a preços, promoção e comunicação de e-commerce. Sempre conectado com as equipes de vendas. Além disso, você apoiará a gestão de campanhas, atividades de lançamento de produtos e contribuirá para o processo de conversão de ponta a ponta.  SUAS RESPONSABILIDADES INCLUEM:   Auxiliar na gestão de campanhas promocionais apoiando os especialistas em desempenho do produto  Utilizar o Microsoft Excel para criação, análise e auditoria de relatórios  Colaborar com a equipe para executar planos de ação que aumentem as taxas de conversão on-line   Apoiar a implementação de projetos destinados a melhorar os KPIs on-line    DÊ O PRIMEIRO PASSO EM SUA JORNADA PROFISSIONAL:   Cada membro de nossa equipe adiciona uma perspectiva única ao nosso sucesso coletivo. Para prosperar neste papel, estamos procurando pessoas que possuam as seguintes qualificações:  QUALIFICAÇÕES ESSENCIAIS   Conhecimento de Microsoft Excel para criação e análise de relatórios  Boas habilidades de organização e pensamento sistemático  Cursando faculdade  QUALIFICAÇÕES DESEJÁVEIS   Inglês preferencialmente avançado Excel Avançado Compreensão das tendências e dinâmicas do mercado de e-commerce  Conhecimento geral de métricas da web  Exposição prévia a marketing digital ou e-commerce  Embarque em sua jornada para contribuir para a excelência operacional de nossa plataforma de e-commerce e faça um impacto significativo em nossa presença on-line. Junte-se a nós enquanto nos esforçamos para redefinir os padrões de sucesso no cenário digital.    Quem somos? Acreditamos que cada um de nós tem o poder de causar um impacto. É por isso que colocamos os membros da nossa equipa no centro de tudo o que fazemos. Se está à procura de uma oportunidade para desenvolver a sua carreira com algumas das melhores mentes e a tecnologia mais avançada do sector, estamos à sua procura. A Dell Technologies é uma família única de empresas que ajuda indivíduos e organizações a transformar a forma como trabalham, vivem e se divertem. Junte-se a nós para construir um futuro que funcione para todos, porque o progresso é de todos nós. Job Title: NextGen Sales Academy Associate Inside Sales Rep 2024
Job Description: Associate Inside Sales Representative At Dell Technologies, we build the extraordinary. Our Associate Inside Sales Representatives are the specialists who sell innovation to the world. Responsible for a set of products and services, they get to know their portfolio inside and out. Our Inside Sales teams rely on them for technical advice during the sales process. They directly advise customers on everything from product features and configurations, through to pricing and availability. Crucially, however complex the question, they’re ready to deliver technical solutions to meet customers’ needs via phone, chat, web or email. Join us as an Associate Inside Sales Representative on our Sales team in Hopkinton, Massachusetts and Round Rock, Texas to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact. What you’ll achieve In the  Next Generation Sales Academy (NGSA),  you will engage in an intense program that will prepare you for long-term success within the Dell Technologies Sales organization. Over the course of two to three years, you will join our organization as an Associate Inside Sales Representative where you’ll receive premier training from both a technology and sales perspective. Next, you will have the opportunity to be promoted to an Inside Sales Representative, where you will carry a quota and run all aspects of a sales campaign. From there, you can take your career to the next level in outside field sales, sales management, or a specialty selling role. We often see those who are successful in this program having 2-3 jobs in your first three years, all with more responsibility, larger business contribution, and an increase in financial earnings. You will: Be immersed in the sales and technology industry by talking to and building relationships with customers as well as qualifying opportunities to drive company revenue Have consistent engagement and collaboration with the NGSA management team, inside sales teams, field sales teams, renewals teams, and development team Participate in white board competitions, group messaging competitions, and meet metrics expectations Take the first step towards your dream career  Every Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table. Here’s what we are looking for with this role: Essential Requirements Completed Associate’s or Bachelor’s degree prior to start date Passionate about a sales career in the technology industry Strong verbal and written communication skills  Relationship building and interpersonal skills Desirable Requirements  A leader with resilient work ethic who is reliable, confident, collaborative, driven and coachable Ability to influence others and convey a sense of urgency to drive issues to closure Dell’s Flexible & Hybrid Work Culture At Dell Technologies, we believe our best work is done when flexibility is offered. We know that freedom and flexibility are crucial to all our employees no matter where you are located and our flexible and hybrid work style allows team members to have the freedom to ideate, be innovative, and drive results their way. To learn more about our work culture, please visit our  locations  page. Compensation Dell is committed to fair and equitable compensation practices. The pay range for this position is $52,445 – $86,680 depending on location. Who we are We believe that each of us has the power to make an impact. That’s why we put our team members at the center of everything we do. If you’re looking for an opportunity to grow your career with some of the best minds and most advanced tech in the industry, we’re looking for you. Dell Technologies is a unique family of businesses that helps individuals and organizations transform how they work, live and play. Business Intelligence Senior Advisor Slovakia Dell Technologies is driven by data. Our business is built on the understanding that data creates value and drives progress. Internal clients across Dell rely on us to analyze, test, validate, and maintain the integrity of data. We make use of leading-edge software and tools to collect, mine, and interpret data and produce dashboards to influence performance related decisions with a global impact. Join us as a  Business Intelligence Senior Advisor   in our  Supply Chain  Performance Management  team in  Bratislava, Slovakia  to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact.  What you’ll achieve As a  Business Intelligence Senior Advisor , you will evaluate business data to produce meaningful insights and metrics, identifying trends that improve business performance. You will influence decisions based on analytics insights and engage in performance and program management for projects across all regions. You will encourage best practices and knowledge sharing within the organization and as a trusted partner for customer centric KPIs you will have a profound impact on customer satisfaction. You will: Analyze data, formulate conclusions and provide summary analysis and interpretation to demand planning leadership. Provide analytical and business intelligence support to a business unit with the ability to work on projects and manage stakeholders across business verticals & regions. Visualize the data through PowerBI in order to discover ineffectiveness. A utomate the data flow through SSIS and R.  Monitor and maintain automations post-implementation and resolve any potential issues to ensure smooth business operations Define projects, collect requirements, write detailed plans, and coordinate efforts across teams Simplify and standardize reports at regular intervals, define and influence metrics definitions from a global perspective Design, run and implement reporting to support the demand planning teams and collaborate with other groups to provide feedback and help in process improvement Take the first step towards your dream career Every Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table. Here’s what we are looking for with this role: Essential Requirements    5+ yrs. of relevant experience with a Bachelor's or Master’s Degree in Data Management, Statistics, Machine Learning Demonstrable advanced SQL knowledge and ability to create medium to complex queries and procedures in PostgreSQL and Teradata Experience with visualization tools such as Tableau or Power BI. Ability to collaborate in a team environment with proven expertise in reporting. Problem-solving and trouble-shooting skills using operational and diagnostic procedures. Ability to maintain databases, cleanse and validate data as needed, develop database logic to extract required information for reporting. Desirable Requirements Working knowledge in tools such as R-studio & SSIS.   Salary staring from:  3 000 EUR gross/monthly   Who we are   We believe that each of us has the power to make an impact.  That is  why we put our team members at the center of everything we do.  If  you are  looking for an opportunity to grow your career with some of the best minds and most advanced tech in the industry,  we are  looking for you.     Application closing date:  15 January 2023 Dell Technologies is a unique family of businesses that helps individuals and organizations transform how they work, live and play. Job Posting Senior Technical Support Technician At Dell Technologies, world-class service doesn’t end when a customer purchases our innovative products. Our Technical Support team is there for them whenever they need help – by phone or email, online and on social media. No matter how complex the challenge, we rise to it. We answer questions about the installation, operation, configuration, customization and use of Dell Technologies products. For critical matters, we use our systems to provide remote diagnostic technical support. If there’s an issue with a customer’s product, we’ll analyze it, identify the cause, recommend a solution and document the problem. Join us as a  Senior Technician  on our  Product Services  team in  [Bayan Lepas, Penang]  to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact. What you’ll achieve As a Senior Technical Support Technician, you will work with highly skilled technical advisors to develop and deliver solutions that enable customers to maximize returns on IT investments, drive efficiencies and reduce costs. You will: • Solve complex problems for customers and be on top of ambitious expectations • Partner closely with customers while communicating proactively regarding overall progress of queries • Exhibit first-class customer service • Drive operational excellence through quality closures and efficient management of issues • Have the opportunity to mentor and coach other team members Take the first step towards your dream career Every Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table. Here’s what we are looking for with this role: Essential Requirements • Fresh Graduate from IT • World-class customer service, phone etiquette and work ethic • Ability to excel under pressure • Strong problem-solving and trouble-shooting skills using operational and diagnostic procedures Desirable Requirements • Experience with job-associated databases or software Here’s our story; now tell us yours Dell Technologies helps organizations and individuals build a brighter digital tomorrow. Our company is made up of more than 150,000 people, located in over 180 locations around the world. We’re proud to be a diverse and inclusive team and have an endless passion for our mission to drive human progress. What’s most important to us is that you are respected, feel like you can be yourself and have the opportunity to do the best work of your life -- while still having a life. We offer excellent benefits, bonus programs, flexible work arrangements, a variety of career development opportunities, employee resource groups, and much more. We started with computers, but we didn’t stop there. We are helping customers move into the future with multi-cloud, AI and machine learning through the most innovative technology and services portfolio for the data era. Join us and become a part of what’s next in technology, starting today. You can also learn more about us by reading our latest Diversity and Inclusion Report and our plan to make the world a better place by 2030  here . Job Title: 2024 校园招聘 粤语企业客户经理实习生
Job Description: 2024  校园招聘  粤语企业客户经理 实习生 即使在数字领域具有开创性的产品也不能做到自我销售。在戴尔，我们下定决心要为每一个客户及合作   伙伴提供高品质的一流体验。这种体验首先从我们开创性的技术产品组合开始，即客户端解决方案、高端电子设备、配件、移动产品、企业解决方案、服务和软件包。内部销售团队为我们的技术产品组合注入了活力。开发持久的关系、建立和谐的环境并依靠自身完美无瑕的交流技巧，通过电话、 Web 和电子邮件向客户销售产品，这是该团队引以为傲的资本。 欢迎加入我们 [广州] 的 [ 实习生 ] 在 [ 内部销售 ] 团队，您将与业界顶尖的人员一同共事并产生深远的社会影响。 内部销售实习生将运用他们的交流技巧与行业知识，通过电话、 Web 和电子邮件向客户销售公司产品与服务，推动与合作伙伴的合作，最终实现产品解决方案的销售。 关键职责： ·          学习团队合作以及跨部门沟通相关技能，了解和学习世界 500 强企业领先的管理方式、业务模式和跨团队协作技能。 ·          学习 IT 前沿技术。包括但不限于： IT 数字化转型，云计算、大数据、人工智能，现代化数据中心基础架构等先进解决方案，学习主流解决方案。 ·          提供客户开发至客户维护技能学习；优质的企业培训资源，帮助在时间管理、技能提升、职业规划管理上不断提升 ·          管理客户信息，并通过电话和电子邮件等多种方式与客户建立联系，通过沟通来挖掘客户业务机会 ·          通过团队合作赢取客户订单，并协调订单的交付，学习销售策略，掌握销售流程。 基本要求： ·          良好的沟通能力和学习能力 ·          对销售岗位高度热忱 ·          2025  届本科及以上学历和粤语流利同学优先 戴尔科技集团旗下拥有多家企业，面向客户提供各种创新技术和服务产品组合，旨在助力组织和个人构建数字化未来并实现工作、生活和娱乐方式转型。客户至上、互利共赢、积极创新、追求成效、诚信经营是我们的准则。加入我们独具魅力的大家庭，体验崇尚多元化和包容性的企业文化，享受颇具竞争力的薪酬、奖励方案、优厚福利以及宝贵的学习和发展机会，轻松拓展职业生涯。 了解 我们如何弥合多元化差距。 截止日期： 2024 年 6 月  30 日 戴尔秉持所有员工工作机会平等的原则，致力于为员工提供 ⼀个无歧视、无骚扰的工作环境。戴尔的所有雇用决策基于业务需求、工作要求以及资历，与⺠族、肤色、宗教或信仰、国籍、出身或种族、性别（包括怀孕）、年龄、身体、精神或知觉障碍、 HIV 状况、性取向、性别认同和 / 或表达、婚姻、民事结合或同居伴侣关系状况、过去或现在的兵役、家族病史或遗传信息、家庭或 ⽗⺟状况或任何其他受我们运营地点的法律法规保护的状况无关。戴尔决不容忍基于任何上述特征的歧视或骚扰。单 击 此处 ，了解有关戴尔多元化和包容性文化的详细信息。 Job ID: R229061 Dell’s Flexible & Hybrid Work Culture At Dell Technologies, we believe our best work is done when flexibility is offered. We know that freedom and flexibility are crucial to all our employees no matter where you are located and our flexible and hybrid work style allows team members to have the freedom to ideate, be innovative, and drive results their way. To learn more about our work culture, please visit our  locations  page.

Job Description: 2024  校园招聘  粤语企业客户经理 实习生 即使在数字领域具有开创性的产品也不能做到自我销售。在戴尔，我们下定决心要为每一个客户及合作   伙伴提供高品质的一流体验。这种体验首先从我们开创性的技术产品组合开始，即客户端解决方案、高端电子设备、配件、移动产品、企业解决方案、服务和软件包。内部销售团队为我们的技术产品组合注入了活力。开发持久的关系、建立和谐的环境并依靠自身完美无瑕的交流技巧，通过电话、 Web 和电子邮件向客户销售产品，这是该团队引以为傲的资本。 欢迎加入我们 [广州] 的 [ 实习生 ] 在 [ 内部销售 ] 团队，您将与业界顶尖的人员一同共事并产生深远的社会影响。 内部销售实习生将运用他们的交流技巧与行业知识，通过电话、 Web 和电子邮件向客户销售公司产品与服务，推动与合作伙伴的合作，最终实现产品解决方案的销售。 关键职责： ·          学习团队合作以及跨部门沟通相关技能，了解和学习世界 500 强企业领先的管理方式、业务模式和跨团队协作技能。 ·          学习 IT 前沿技术。包括但不限于： IT 数字化转型，云计算、大数据、人工智能，现代化数据中心基础架构等先进解决方案，学习主流解决方案。 ·          提供客户开发至客户维护技能学习；优质的企业培训资源，帮助在时间管理、技能提升、职业规划管理上不断提升 ·          管理客户信息，并通过电话和电子邮件等多种方式与客户建立联系，通过沟通来挖掘客户业务机会 ·          通过团队合作赢取客户订单，并协调订单的交付，学习销售策略，掌握销售流程。 基本要求： ·          良好的沟通能力和学习能力 ·          对销售岗位高度热忱 ·          2025  届本科及以上学历和粤语流利同学优先 戴尔科技集团旗下拥有多家企业，面向客户提供各种创新技术和服务产品组合，旨在助力组织和个人构建数字化未来并实现工作、生活和娱乐方式转型。客户至上、互利共赢、积极创新、追求成效、诚信经营是我们的准则。加入我们独具魅力的大家庭，体验崇尚多元化和包容性的企业文化，享受颇具竞争力的薪酬、奖励方案、优厚福利以及宝贵的学习和发展机会，轻松拓展职业生涯。 了解 我们如何弥合多元化差距。 截止日期： 2024 年 6 月  30 日 戴尔秉持所有员工工作机会平等的原则，致力于为员工提供 ⼀个无歧视、无骚扰的工作环境。戴尔的所有雇用决策基于业务需求、工作要求以及资历，与⺠族、肤色、宗教或信仰、国籍、出身或种族、性别（包括怀孕）、年龄、身体、精神或知觉障碍、 HIV 状况、性取向、性别认同和 / 或表达、婚姻、民事结合或同居伴侣关系状况、过去或现在的兵役、家族病史或遗传信息、家庭或 ⽗⺟状况或任何其他受我们运营地点的法律法规保护的状况无关。戴尔决不容忍基于任何上述特征的歧视或骚扰。单 击 此处 ，了解有关戴尔多元化和包容性文化的详细信息。 Job ID: R229058 Dell’s Flexible & Hybrid Work Culture At Dell Technologies, we believe our best work is done when flexibility is offered. We know that freedom and flexibility are crucial to all our employees no matter where you are located and our flexible and hybrid work style allows team members to have the freedom to ideate, be innovative, and drive results their way. To learn more about our work culture, please visit our  locations  page.

Job Description: 2024  校园招聘  粤语企业客户经理 实习生 即使在数字领域具有开创性的产品也不能做到自我销售。在戴尔，我们下定决心要为每一个客户及合作   伙伴提供高品质的一流体验。这种体验首先从我们开创性的技术产品组合开始，即客户端解决方案、高端电子设备、配件、移动产品、企业解决方案、服务和软件包。内部销售团队为我们的技术产品组合注入了活力。开发持久的关系、建立和谐的环境并依靠自身完美无瑕的交流技巧，通过电话、 Web 和电子邮件向客户销售产品，这是该团队引以为傲的资本。 欢迎加入我们 [广州] 的 [ 实习生 ] 在 [ 内部销售 ] 团队，您将与业界顶尖的人员一同共事并产生深远的社会影响。 内部销售实习生将运用他们的交流技巧与行业知识，通过电话、 Web 和电子邮件向客户销售公司产品与服务，推动与合作伙伴的合作，最终实现产品解决方案的销售。 关键职责： ·          学习团队合作以及跨部门沟通相关技能，了解和学习世界 500 强企业领先的管理方式、业务模式和跨团队协作技能。 ·          学习 IT 前沿技术。包括但不限于： IT 数字化转型，云计算、大数据、人工智能，现代化数据中心基础架构等先进解决方案，学习主流解决方案。 ·          提供客户开发至客户维护技能学习；优质的企业培训资源，帮助在时间管理、技能提升、职业规划管理上不断提升 ·          管理客户信息，并通过电话和电子邮件等多种方式与客户建立联系，通过沟通来挖掘客户业务机会 ·          通过团队合作赢取客户订单，并协调订单的交付，学习销售策略，掌握销售流程。 基本要求： ·          良好的沟通能力和学习能力 ·          对销售岗位高度热忱 ·          2025  届本科及以上学历和粤语流利同学优先 戴尔科技集团旗下拥有多家企业，面向客户提供各种创新技术和服务产品组合，旨在助力组织和个人构建数字化未来并实现工作、生活和娱乐方式转型。客户至上、互利共赢、积极创新、追求成效、诚信经营是我们的准则。加入我们独具魅力的大家庭，体验崇尚多元化和包容性的企业文化，享受颇具竞争力的薪酬、奖励方案、优厚福利以及宝贵的学习和发展机会，轻松拓展职业生涯。 了解 我们如何弥合多元化差距。 截止日期： 2024 年 6 月  30 日 戴尔秉持所有员工工作机会平等的原则，致力于为员工提供 ⼀个无歧视、无骚扰的工作环境。戴尔的所有雇用决策基于业务需求、工作要求以及资历，与⺠族、肤色、宗教或信仰、国籍、出身或种族、性别（包括怀孕）、年龄、身体、精神或知觉障碍、 HIV 状况、性取向、性别认同和 / 或表达、婚姻、民事结合或同居伴侣关系状况、过去或现在的兵役、家族病史或遗传信息、家庭或 ⽗⺟状况或任何其他受我们运营地点的法律法规保护的状况无关。戴尔决不容忍基于任何上述特征的歧视或骚扰。单 击 此处 ，了解有关戴尔多元化和包容性文化的详细信息。 Job ID: R229054 Dell’s Flexible & Hybrid Work Culture At Dell Technologies, we believe our best work is done when flexibility is offered. Job Title: インサイドセールス（宮崎勤務・内勤・スモールビジネス担当）
Job Description: インサイドセールス   デル・テクノロジーズのインサイドセールスは、 ハイレベルできめ細やかな サービスを提供し 、 世界にイノベーションを営業するスペシャリストです。 一連 の製品 ・ サービスを担当 することで 、幅広い ポートフォリオ を学ぶこと が できます 。電話、チャット、ウェブ、メールを通してお客様 と持続的 で良好 な関係を築き、 お客様の 課題解決 に取り組みます。   仕事内容 概要   インサイドセールスは電話やメールでお客様と商談を行う内勤の営業職です。いわゆる電話オペレーターではなく、外勤営業や技術営業からなるセールスチームの中心的存在としてお客様対応のフロントに立ち、またセールスチームを纏め上げるリーダーシップが必要とされる職種です。お客様にかかわる様々な営業メンバーと連携し、お客様へのアプローチを致しますが、最初の商談から案件受注までのお客様対応を一貫して内勤営業が対応します。  具体的な仕事内容   中小企業のお客様を対象に、パソコン・周辺機器のみならず、サーバー・ストレージ、セキュリティ製品など多岐に渡る商材の営業活動を行います。 お客様の抱えるIT問題を解決し、お客様のデジタルトランスフォメーション(DX)の加速を支援するためのソリューション提案を行います。 変化の激しいIT業界の中でもデルは最先端の技術・価値を提供しており、お客様のIT課題をあらゆる側面から解決する方法を提案します。 所属組織   従業員規模１００名以下の中小企業のお客様を担当、約80％の社員がIT業界未経験からスタートしています。 勤務地   宮崎市（出社と在宅勤務を組み合わせたハイブリッドワーク） ※勤務地以外からのフルリモートワークは不可   応募 要件   必須 要件   業界不問での営業経験1年以上（または販売経験・接客経験3年以上） 基本的なPCスキル（MS Office/ Excel, Word, Outlookなど) 高いコミュニケーションスキルおよび提案力 歓迎要件   IT業界での個人または法人営業経験がある方 ハードウェア・ソフトウエアの知識がある方 求める人物像   インサイドセールスとしてお客様窓口のフロントに立って経験を積むことで社会人として、さらには営業職として短時間で成長を実感したいという方を求めています。   福利厚生 　   社会保険完 備  （雇用保険、労 災 保険、健康保険、厚生年金保険）   健康支援：任意加入団体医療保険、スポーツ補助金など   所得補償：長期私傷病休暇、長期所得補償保険   育児・介護支援：出産特別休暇、産前産後休暇、育児休業・子の看護休暇、介護休業・介護休暇、残業等規制、短時間勤務等、育児・介護補助金など   資産形成：確定拠出年金、社内キャッシュバランスプラン 、 財形貯蓄   慶弔対応：特別弔慰金、慶弔見舞金、慶弔休暇   生活支援：通勤手当、社員割引制度、在宅勤 務 制度   など     ◆ カジュアル面談 ◆   応募 を 悩まれ てい る方、 ポジションや会社 概要 についてまずは お 話を聞いてみたい 方は カジュアル面談 をご活用ください。   カジュアル面談は 選考ではありません 。 採用担当者とざっくばらん に話 し、 ご 経験やご希望 に合致するポジション 、気になっていること をご確認 いただけます 。     面談 の お申込みは こちら 　     ◆ ダイバーシティの推進 ◆   私たちは 、 2030年まで に 、 「 性 自認が女性である 人が世界中の社員の50%、​管理職の40% を占める 」 という 目標を 掲げ て 日々取り組んでいます。 さまざまなアイデンティティや バックグラウンドを持つ 人 たち が集まり、 誰も が 力を発揮 して活躍 できるカルチャー を 育んでいます。     女性のキャリア支援について詳しくは   Women a t Dell Japan 　をご覧ください。     デル・テクノロジーズについて   デル・テクノロジーズは、個人と組織の働き方・暮らしの変革を支援するユニークな企業です。 社員 一人ひとり の 影響力を信じ 、 すべての取り組み において 社員 を最優先に考えます 。I T 業界で 最先端のテクノロジー を学び、 経験を積む 成長 機会を 求め てい る 方はぜひご応募ください。 進歩に向かって共に前へ進みませんか。     応募締切： 2 024 年　3 月　31 日     デル ・ テクノロジーズは全従業員に対する雇用機会均等の原則 を順守し 、差別やハラスメントのない職場 づくり に コミットしています。 雇用機会均等ポリシーの全文は こちら をご覧ください。   Job ID: R220318 Dell’s Flexible & Hybrid Work Culture At Dell Technologies, we believe our best work is done when flexibility is offered. We know that freedom and flexibility are crucial to all our employees no matter where you are located and our flexible and hybrid work style allows team members to have the freedom to ideate, be innovative, and drive results their way. To learn more about our work culture, please visit our  locations  page.

Job Title: Pasantía en Manejo de Proyectos y Programas
Job Description: Únete a nuestro equipo como Pasante de Manejo de Proyectos y Programas en nuestro equipo de gerencia de proyectos y programas en  Panamá  para hacer el mejor trabajo de tu carrera y lograr un profundo impacto social. Lo que lograrás Como Pasante de Manejo de Proyectos y Programas, será responsable en el apoyo de la definición y entrega exitosa de implementaciones empresariales, será un especialista que ayudará a coordinar a las partes interesadas del proyecto con múltiples funciones, como el soporte preventa y la entrega. Trabajará con clientes con sede en los EE. UU. en múltiples productos. El director de proyecto supervisa los criterios de calidad, maneja riesgos, las interacciones con los clientes, los procesos, los cronogramas, los recursos y los entregables. Además, el director de proyecto opera como punto de contacto principal para clientes internos y externos y responde consultas sobre el estado o escalamientos del proyecto. Dentro de esta posición podrás: Liderar múltiples proyectos de implementación Manejar proyectos de implementación para llevarlos a un resultado exitoso y de valor para nuestros clientes Adquirir experiencia en manejo de proyectos Da el primer paso hacia la carrera de tus sueños Cada miembro del equipo de Dell Technologies aporta algo único. Esto es lo que buscamos para este rol: Requerimientos esenciales: Ingles avanzado Matriculado/a en el tercer o cuarto año de la carrera universitaria en Administración de Negocios, Manejo de Proyectos, Ingeniería Industrial, o programa de estudios relacionado. Disponibilidad de horario por la mañana (6 horas al día) Comunicación efectiva (escrita y verbal) Flexibilidad de aprendizaje y proactividad Habilidad de manejar y priorizar tiempo y recursos para cumplir con los requerimientos de los clientes Manejo de Microsoft Office (Outlook, Excel, Word, Power Point) Requerimientos deseables: Conocimiento o experiencia con proyectos Conocimiento de productos “Enterprise” Habilidad de influenciar y persuadir a otros Entendimiento de la cultura norteamericana Esta es nuestra historia; ahora cuéntanos la tuya Dell Technologies ayuda a las organizaciones y a los individuos a construir un mañana digital más brillante. Nuestra empresa está formada por más de 150.000 personas, ubicadas en más de 180 lugares de todo el mundo. Estamos orgullosos de ser un equipo diverso e inclusivo y tenemos una pasión infinita por nuestra misión de impulsar el progreso humano. Lo más importante para nosotros es que te respeten, que sientas que puedes ser tú mismo y que tengas la oportunidad de hacer el mejor trabajo de tu vida, sin dejar de tener una vida. Ofrecemos excelentes beneficios, programas de bonificación, acuerdos de trabajo flexibles, una variedad de oportunidades de desarrollo profesional, grupos de recursos para empleados y mucho más. Empezamos con los ordenadores, pero no nos quedamos ahí. Estamos ayudando a los clientes a avanzar hacia el futuro con la multi-nube, la IA y el aprendizaje automático a través de la tecnología más innovadora y la cartera de servicios para la era de los datos. Únase a nosotros y forme parte de lo próximo en tecnología, a partir de hoy. También puedes saber más sobre nosotros leyendo nuestro último Informe de Diversidad e Inclusión y nuestro plan para hacer del mundo un lugar mejor en 2030  aquí . Fecha de cierre de la solicitud:  15 de Febrero del 2024 Dell se compromete a respetar el principio de igualdad de oportunidades de empleo para todos los empleados y a proporcionarles un entorno de trabajo libre de discriminación y acoso. Todas las decisiones de empleo en Dell se basan en las necesidades de la empresa, los requisitos del puesto y las cualificaciones individuales, sin tener en cuenta la raza, el color, la religión o las creencias, el origen nacional, social o étnico, el sexo (incluido el embarazo), la edad, la discapacidad física, mental o sensorial, el estado de VIH, la orientación sexual, la identidad y/o expresión de género, el estado civil, la unión civil o la pareja de hecho, el servicio militar pasado o presente, el historial médico familiar o la información genética, el estado familiar o parental, o cualquier otro estado protegido por las leyes o reglamentos de los lugares donde operamos. Dell no tolerará la discriminación o el acoso basados en ninguna de estas características. Dell anima a los solicitantes de todas las edades. MLOps/DevOps Engineer Intern Data Science is all about breaking new ground to enable businesses to answer their most urgent questions. Pioneering massively parallel data-intensive analytic processing, our mission is to develop a whole new approach to generating meaning and value from petabyte-scale data sets and shape brand new methodologies, tools, statistical methods and models. What’s more, we are in collaboration with leading academics, industry experts and highly skilled engineers to equip our customers to generate sophisticated new insights from the biggest of big data. Our data scientists & engineers are helping to shape our marketing strategy for a digital world and at scale. We are looking for a DevOps Engineer Intern to help up take care of our Machine Learning Models in production. What you'll achieve: This position will merge DevOps, software engineering, data science, and data engineering to deploy machine learning models that can optimize business and customer experiences at scale.  You will use your technical knowledge and software development to help build technology-centric solutions that accelerate the development of Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning capabilities across the company. You will work with our Machine Learning Engineers to build robust and scalable solutions that help power our Marketing organization with AI/ML models. You will: Assist in deploying and managing machine learning models in production environments. Collaborate with data scientists and engineers to transition models from development to production. Help set up and maintain infrastructure for model deployment and monitoring. Monitor model performance. Work closely with cross-functional teams to ensure models meet business requirements. Document processes, workflows, and best practices related to ML Ops. Take the first step towards your dream career Every Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table. Here’s what we are looking for with this role: Essential Requirements: Currently pursuing a Bachelor's/Master's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field. Strong programming skills in languages such as Python, and familiarity with tools like TensorFlow, PyTorch, or scikit-learn. Basic understanding of machine learning concepts and model deployment frameworks. Knowledge and experience with containerization technologies (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes) is a plus. Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills, strong communication skills and ability to work effectively in a team. Desirable Requirements : Team player dedicated to her/his job and self-starter able to work independently, in a cross-functional team environment within an Agile framework. Critical thinking, Learning capacity. Salary starting from:  6.60 Euro/gross hourly Who we are We believe that each of us has the power to make an impact. That’s why we put our team members at the center of everything we do. If you’re looking for an opportunity to grow your career with some of the best minds and most advanced tech in the industry, we’re looking for you. Dell Technologies is a unique family of businesses that helps individuals and organizations transform how they work, live and play. Join us to build a future that works for everyone because Progress Takes All of Us  here . Secureworks (NASDAQ: SCWX) is a global cybersecurity leader that secures human progress with Secureworks® Taegis™, a SaaS-based, open XDR platform built on 20+ years of real-world threat intelligence and research, improving customers’ ability to detect advanced threats, streamline and collaborate on investigations, and automate the right actions. We enjoy competitive compensation and benefits packages, and reward and recognize our employees for exceptional results. A constant focus on continued learning and growth keeps our team members engaged and excited about “what’s next.” We offer flexible work options when available, and emphasize the importance of work-life balance. We know that when our people are rewarded, recognized, and rejuvenated, we win as a team. As we serve a global customer base and our mission is to secure human progress, the security expertise is essential to our business, that’s why we seek out the industry’s passionate and brightest minds to assess and understand the sense of urgency of the threat and to apply that research and experience across our operations, enhancing the security posture of the organizations that we are protecting.   “For us, mission really matters. So, if you want to work somewhere where you know that what you’re doing is making the world a safer place and if you want to be a part of the team of heroes that save those organizations, or frankly, prevent those cyberattacks from happening in the first place, I think the interest in this as a career path really starts to get a little more exciting” -  CEO, Wendy K. Thomas   Role Overview   Be part of an exciting team that deals with bleeding-edge information security attacks, malware infections, and incident response situations  on a daily basis .  Protecting our clients from threat actors attempting to compromise their environments.   Working as a   Cyber  Security analysts  in  a   security  operations center environment with other security and networking professionals, you will extend your currently existing network and endpoint  security investigation  analysis skillset through identification, assessment, review and authoring of incident reports in a variety of client environments. You will actively investigate  threat actor activity,  malware infections, living off the land attacks, as well as a variety of other security incidents and provide clients with the impact of the threat, your assessment of the incident, as well as recommendations.     Role Responsibilities     In this position you will be responsible for monitoring  and  investigating  IT security  alerts, determining the source of the threat, the extent to which client assets have been compromised and making recommendations for remediation.   Perform analysis of security events from multiple sources including but not limited to events  from  endpoint  detection tools, network and host-based IDS, firewall logs, system logs (Unix & Windows), mainframes, mid-range, applications, and databases.   Interface with clients  via chat, tickets, phone  calls   to  address their issues, concerns, and questions, and drive to satisfactory closure any issues that impact the service and its value   Requirements   Experience ,  Skills  and Abilities   Experienc e :   Previous  experience in raw log files review, data correlation, and analysis ( e.g.,  firewalls logs, network flows, intrusion detection systems, system logs).  Awareness of Information Security concepts (malware, emerging threats, attacks, and vulnerability management).    Previous  customer support experience including the resolution of customer escalations, incident handling and reporting   Skills and/or abilities required to perform the essential functions of the job   Good  technical communication skills, both written and verbal   Excellent  problem-solving  skills that would allow for the ability to diagnose and troubleshoot technical issues   Client-focused with a passion for delivering service excellence   S ense of urgency and ability to work under pressure   Possess high standard of integrity and  confidentiality       Education/Experience   1 - 3  years of work experience in  Experience in adjacent areas (Security Operations Center, Network Operations Center, System Administrator, Platform/Tool Support Engineer, IT Helpdesk support).     Preferred  Certifications   One or more   Industry certification from vendors  such as : ISC2, GIAC, EC-Council, Cisco, Juniper, CompTIA, ITIL, Unix, Microsoft, Oracle, etc.   Language   English -  Very strong  verbal and  written  skills     Work schedule       working in  12  hrs.   shifts  (day/night)  or 10  hrs.  shifts     Secureworks is committed to the principle of equal employment opportunity for all employees and to providing employees with a work environment free of discrimination and harassment. All employment decisions at Secureworks are based on business needs, job requirements and individual qualifications, without regard to race, color, religion or belief, national, social or ethnic origin, sex (including pregnancy), age, physical, mental or sensory disability, HIV status, sexual orientation, gender identity and/or expression, marital, civil union or domestic partnership status, past or present military service, family medical history or genetic information, family or parental status, or any other status protected by the laws or regulations in the locations where we operate. Job Title: Graduate Solutions Architect Presales - French Speaker
Job Description: Graduate Solutions Architect Presales - French Speaker When our customers are looking for IT consulting expertise, where else would they turn but to the company driving human progress through technology? Our Solutions Architecture team within Professional Services are experts in package customization and integration as well as total, end-to-end solutions in targeted industry segments. After thorough consultation with our customers and careful analysis, we develop new IT systems or replace existing systems that support customers’ strategic, operational and financial goals. Join us as a  Presales Analyst   on our  Solutions Architecture  Team in  Casablanca  to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact. What you’ll achieve As a Presales Analyst, you will be responsible for working with your peers from the Sales, Presales and Deployment organizations to bring together solutions that meet our customer’s ever changing needs. You will own the creation and governance of proposal and Statement of Work documentation and will work closely with technical subject matter experts across multiple fields. You will: Consult with external customers and implements new IT solutions and/or replaces existing IT solutions Develop and offer integrated, end-to-end IT solutions that support the customer’s strategic, operational and financial goals and positions Dell for rapidly growing business Be responsible for translating the client’s business and technical requirements into specific systems, applications or process designs for very large, complex technology solutions and integrating architecture Provide technical and/or (business consultative) services during the pre-sales and/or post-sales cycle May provide technical or business analytical leadership for specific product groups or business objectives in order to engage the customer or implement and maintain an engagement Take the first step towards your dream career Every Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table. Job Title: Principal Supplier Process Engineer on PCBA
Job Description: Principal Supplier Process Engineer When you're creating technology that drives human progress, everything needs to be spot on. Our Supplier Process Engineering team works with our suppliers to enable them to produce materials and components of the highest quality. Executive presentation skills 9+ years work experience in engineering mgmt., quality, or related technical function with Bachelors / Master in Engineering is preferred. ​ Desirable Requirements Experience leading cross-functional teams and Strong English and Command Skills, to lead the decision-making process across multiple areas of the business. Job Title: Managing Director of Global Privacy Legal & EMEA Data Protection Officer
Job Description: Director of Global Privacy Legal & EMEA Data Protection Officer (M10 Grade) Join us as the Dell Director of Global Privacy Legal and EMEA Data Protection Officer (“DPO”) in Ireland, our main establishment in the EU, where you will be able to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact. What you’ll achieve We are looking for an experienced Privacy attorney and manager who can lead our global team of Privacy attorneys and act as the EMEA Data Protection Officer (“DPO”).  This role will fulfill the role of DPO, manage a global team of privacy lawyers and be a strategic privacy legal partner to the business and legal departments. You will play a significant role in policy and business counseling and compliance with the GDPR and other relevant international privacy laws.  This role will directly report to Dell’s Chief Privacy Officer. You will: Manage and lead a team of global privacy attorneys that advises leadership and stakeholders on the assessment and implementation of evolving global privacy risks and privacy regulations, and the substance, interpretation and application of international privacy laws as applied to Dell’s business Provide strategic vision, legal guidance and leadership on the company’s global privacy strategy and compliance, including but not limited to, assessment of key regulatory risks and implementation of mitigation best practices, collaboration with regional counsel on privacy-related issues, advising the Government Affairs team on evolving international privacy laws and regulatory positions, guidance and oversight of training and communication to raise awareness on privacy obligations and responsibilities enterprise-wide, management of privacy notices, statements and communications to ensure data subjects are aware of their data protection rights Act as the company’s EMEA Data Protection Officer by: serving as the primary point of contact for EU regulators and other third parties for queries, complaints, incidents or regulatory investigations, advising on the substance and application of the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), as well as European Data Protection Board (EDPB) and other regulator guidance and Court of Justice of the European Union (CJEU) and other authority decisions, conducting assessments to ensure GDPR compliance and drawing the compliance program’s attention to any potential failure to comply with applicable data protection rules Manage strategic subject matter expertise and guidance on the drafting and negotiation of data privacy/protection provisions in customers and suppliers/vendors/service providers agreements and act as an escalation point in accordance with Dell’s legal department’s contracts approval matrix policy Manage and advise on privacy investigations as privileging attorney and integrate lessons learned back into Dell’s global privacy program Take the first step towards your dream career Every Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table. Here’s what we are looking for with this role:   Essential Requirements  J.D. degree with admission to at least one U.S. state bar or international equivalent 12+ years’ expertise with global privacy laws, with at least 7+ years’ expertise with privacy laws in EEA Countries Deep experience with EU senior regulators, providing advisory support in regulatory matters and incident management, and providing strategic legal support to ensure privacy regulatory compliance readiness by an organization on emerging privacy laws and regulations Direct or indirect experience managing teams and providing strategic direction on privacy programs Personal skills: integrity, initiative, organization, perseverance, discretion, ability to assert yourself in difficult circumstances, communication, negotiation, conflict resolution, ability to build working relationships and ability to influence, interest in data protection and motivation to be a DPO Desirable Requirements  DPO specific training and certification (e.g., Maastricht ECPC-B EU DPO training) and additional IAPP Privacy Certifications (e.g., CIPP/E, CIPP/US, CIPP/C, CIPP/A, CIPT) Strong experience within the technology sector, AdTech deployments and global data transfer management, and global cloud/multi-cloud products and services Here’s our story; now tell us yours Dell Technologies helps organizations and individuals build a brighter digital tomorrow. Principal AI Solutions Development Engineer Technological advancements continue to empower human progress to newer heights and innovations in the space of Artificial Intelligence (AI) are at the pinnacle of this transformation. Dell Technologies is at the center of this “empowering the possible” in every sector and vertical such technological solutions and products has a role to play. With Generative AI (GenAI) led momentum in the industry, Dell Technologies remains at the forefront by helping solve customer challenges with its industry leading products and solutions. Dell Technologies’ Integrated Solutions brings Dell and partner hardware and software products together in the form of reference and validated designs. These designs, paired with various services offers, allow customers to embark on the AI and GenAI journey with confidence, irrespective of their starting point in this transformational journey. Our Solutions Development Engineers operate at the cutting edge of technological advancements. We design and develop AI and GenAI solutions integrating GPU accelerated compute, network and storage products, in Slurm and Kubernetes clustered environments, allowing data scientists and developers to develop, fine tune, customize and deploy (for inference) AI models towards various use-cases and deployment environments (core, edge, cloud and anything in between). Join us to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact as a  Principal  AI Solutions Development Engineer  on our  AI Solutions Engineering  Team in  Austin, Texas. What you’ll achieve    As a Principal AI Solutions Development Engineer, you will be r esponsible for the engineering work necessary to develop Dell Integrated Solutions based on the Generative AI-based compute, network, and storage infrastructure environment. You will work closely with multiple Dell stakeholders to ensure all engineering solutions projects align with Dell Technologies’ AI strategy. You will: Review requirements and develop test plans based on the Generative AI solution specifications and Product Manager’s Product Requirements Document Configure, deploy and test AI workloads running on the Generative AI environment;  critical responsibilities of the role are to troubleshoot and resolve issues, conduct technical reviews of all deliverables and continually communicate project status to all relevant stakeholders Review and analyze internal and external engineering-specific documentation related to projects; you will share knowledge with peers and leaders to improve internal processes and drive ideas to streamline future development work Utilize your expertise to assist in the development of sales maker, customer and partner content e.g. sizing guides, design guides, technical white papers, implementation guides, technical blogs Take the first step towards your dream career Every Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table. Here’s what we are looking for with this role:  Essential Requirements 5+ years’ industry experience;  experience developing and deploying end-to-end (infrastructure to platform to application to workload to use-cases) solutions is highly desired Knowledge in infrastructure deployment and the hardware ecosystem e.g. servers, storage and networking (to include IP addressing, subnets, VLANs etc.) Solid understanding of Linux-based operating systems (deployment and configuration) and cluster management; must be able to deply and manage containers, Kubernetes and Slurm clusters Familiarity of AI Technologies e.g. Generative/Cognitive AI framework/models, Machine Learning/Deep Learning, Large Language Models (LLMs) AI platforms/libraries (e.g. Hugging Face, TensorFlow) and Open-Source ML frameworks (PyTorch)  Excellent collaboration, communication and presentation skills; must be able to work with all levels of the organization and effectively communicate status of development work to relevant stakeholders in a consistent and timely manner Desirable Requirements Degree in a quantitative field (Computer Science, Mathematics, Statistics, Electrical Engineering, Physical Sciences, etc.) Who we are We believe that each of us has the power to make an impact. Technologie ist allgegenwärtig und verändert die Welt. Komm in unser Team und bestimme heute mit, wie die Zukunft der Technologie von morgen aussieht. Du bist ein/e engagierter/e Student:in und möchtest praktische Erfahrungen im Bereich Vertrieb sammeln? Dann bist du bei uns genau richtig! Unser Vertriebsteam kümmert sich um die Entwicklung von Vertriebsprozessen und -verfahren für die Verwaltung, das Fulfillment und die Kommunikation, sowohl bei Online- als auch bei Offlinebestellungen. Wir bieten dir eine Umgebung, in der du deine besten Ergebnisse erzielen und einen sinnvollen Beitrag zur Gesellschaft leisten kannst. Du wirst die Möglichkeit haben, praktische Erfahrungen im Vertrieb zu sammeln und deine kommunikativen Fähigkeiten weiterzuentwickeln.  Das sind deine Aufgaben und Ziele: Als Werkstudent:in in einem unserer Vertriebsteam wirst du die Vertriebsmitarbeiter unterstützen und wertvolle Zuarbeiten leisten. Dazu gehören: Basistraining zu unserem Produktportfolio Softskilltrainings zum Kundenumgang und -betreuung Recherchen, Datenbereinigungen, Beantragungen und die Realisierung vertriebsrelevanter Informationen  Bearbeitung von Angeboten/Aufträgen  Projekte aktualisieren und bearbeiten, Projektpflege im CRM-Tool Kontaktaufnahme mit Kunden per Telefon und E-Mail sowie die Aktualisierung und Anlage von Systemkonfigurationen in Kundenportalen Das erwartet dich darüber hinaus: Eine interessante, eigenverantwortliche Tätigkeit Internationale Zusammenarbeit Familiäres Umfeld im internationalen Konzern - ohne Teamwork geht es nicht! Mache den ersten Schritt in Richtung deiner Traumkarriere.   Das bringst du mit: Immatrikulierte/r Studient:in Gute Kenntnisse in der Nutzung von Office-Anwendungen  Gute kommunikative Fähigkeiten und hohes Engagement  fließende Deutschkenntnisse Gute bis sehr gute Englischkenntnisse in Wort und Schrift Wünschenswerte Qualifikationen:  Vorkenntnisse / erste praktische Erfahrungen im Bereich Vertrieb  Affinität für neue Technologien Das bringen wir mit: Wertschätzung & Mitarbeitervorteile modernes und neu renoviertes Arbeitsumfeld, IT-Equipment (Laptop, Bildschirm, Tastatur, Maus und Headset), Auszeichnungen für besondere Leistungen und zusätzliches Engagement, Kantine und Cafeteria, kostenloser Kaffee, Tee und Wasser, kostenlose Parkplätze Entwicklungsmöglichkeiten Übernahmechancen, kostenlose Nutzung von LinkedIn Learning Studio, verschiedene interne Workshops, Zertifizierungen Gesundheit & Vorsorge betriebliche Altersvorsorge, globale Reisekrankenversicherung, Krankentagesgeld, monatliche Gesundheitsangebote in Form von Yogakursen, Check-ups, Bewegungstrainings, Ernährungsberatung, Blutspende, etc. Work-Life-Balance flexibles Arbeitszeitmodell, hybride Arbeitsmöglichkeiten, Teamevents und zahlreiche interne Veranstaltungen Engagement über den Job hinaus Mitarbeiter-Interessen-Gruppen in verschiedenen Bereichen z.B. Pride, Women in Action, GenerationNext, Family, Planet, True Abilities, Belohnung für ehrenamtliche Tätigkeiten, interne Spende- und Sammelaktionen Wer wir sind: Wir glauben, dass jeder von uns die Chance hat etwas zu bewirken. Deshalb stellen wir unsere Teammitglieder in den Mittelpunkt unseres Handelns. Wenn du auf der Suche nach einer Möglichkeit bist, deine Karriere mit den besten Köpfen und der fortschrittlichsten Technologie der Branche voranzutreiben, dann bist du bei uns genau richtig. Dell Technologies ist eine einzigartige Unternehmensfamilie, die Einzelpersonen und Organisationen dabei hilft, die Art und Weise, wie sie arbeiten, leben und spielen, zu verändern. Arbeite mit uns an einer Zukunft, die für alle funktioniert, denn der Fortschritt braucht uns alle  hier .
