Secureworks (NASDAQ: SCWX) is a global cybersecurity leader that secures human progress with Secureworks® Taegis™, a SaaS-based, open XDR platform built on 20+ years of real-world threat intelligence and research, improving customers’ ability to detect advanced threats, streamline and collaborate on investigations, and automate the right actions. We enjoy competitive compensation and benefits packages, and reward and recognize our employees for exceptional results. A constant focus on continued learning and growth keeps our team members engaged and excited about “what’s next.” We offer flexible work options when available, and emphasize the importance of work-life balance. We know that when our people are rewarded, recognized, and rejuvenated, we win as a team. Role Overview The Incident Response Consultant is primarily focused on the delivery of emergency incident response services. This involves supporting customers by managing the technical and non-technical aspects of incident response, conducting investigative analysis using digital forensics methods to determine the nature, scope, and root cause of cyber incident activity, formulating recommendations for security posture enhancement, and developing tailored remediation plans. Additionally, the Incident Response Consultant may be required to deliver a range of proactive incident response services. These services include cyber threat hunting to help customers identify unknown compromise activity and gaps in their cybersecurity controls, as well as workshops, training courses, and exercises to help customers improve their incident response capabilities. Role Responsibilities Serve as subject matter expert in digital forensics and incident response (DFIR) Perform complex incident response investigative analysis and develop assessments based on the analysis of host, network, and cloud digital artifacts Document analysis findings and develop recommendations to present both orally and in written reports to customers Develop tailored incident response remediation plans for major cyber incidents to direct customer containment and recovery efforts Manage urgent and critical interactions with customers Maintain professional, calming, and authoritative presence during a crisis Participate in a 24x7 on-call rotation for supporting requests from global incident response customers Travel as needed to assist customers with on-site incident response efforts This is a remote (work-from-home) position that may require up to 20% travel. Requirements Minimum five (5) years of cybersecurity experience in complex operating environments Minimum three (3) years in a customer facing support role (Security Engineer, Client Services, Consulting, Professional Services) Minimum of two (2) years of host forensics, network forensics, and cloud forensics experience for threat hunting and incident response efforts GCIH, GCFE, GCFA, GREM or similar certifications Strong communication skills (oral and written) Experience briefing senior-level leadership and conveying technical information to audiences of varying backgrounds and skill levels Ability to prioritize urgent tasks and work multiple consulting engagements concurrently Desire to work with customers to solve complex cybersecurity issues, including during crisis situations Theoretical and practical knowledge in the following areas: Windows and Linux operating systems AWS, Azure (including Microsoft 365), and GCP Exploits, vulnerabilities, intrusion vectors, and malware Tactics, techniques, and procedures (TTPs) commonly employed by threat actors Host forensics, network forensics, and malware analysis techniques Network traffic analysis, endpoint activity analysis, and log analysis techniques Enterprise cyber incident management and response processes Enterprise cybersecurity controls and failure modes Modern Enterprise Detection and Response (EDR) tools Secureworks is committed to the principle of equal employment opportunity for all employees and to providing employees with a work environment free of discrimination and harassment. All employment decisions at Secureworks are based on business needs, job requirements and individual qualifications, without regard to race, color, religion or belief, national, social or ethnic origin, sex (including pregnancy), age, physical, mental or sensory disability, HIV status, sexual orientation, gender identity and/or expression, marital, civil union or domestic partnership status, past or present military service, family medical history or genetic information, family or parental status, or any other status protected by the laws or regulations in the locations where we operate. Secureworks will not tolerate discrimination or harassment based on any of these characteristics. HR Organization Analyst Dell Technologies is driven by data. Our business is built on the understanding that data creates value and drives progress. So, we take the stewardship of our data very seriously. That’s the vital role played by Business Intelligence teams within Business Support. Internal clients across Dell rely on us to analyze, test, validate and maintain the integrity of data. We make use of leading-edge software and tools to collect, mine and interpret data and the statistical analyses and reports we produce inform decisions with a global impact. We’re an organization whose technology transforms the way the world lives and works – and our own internal systems are equally groundbreaking. Job Title: インサイドセールス（東京勤務・内勤・スモールビジネス担当）
Job Description: ＜ Inside Sales Representative ( 内勤営業 ) とは＞ ISR は電話やメールでお客様と商談を行う内勤の営業職です。いわゆる電話オペレーターではなく、外勤営業や技術営業からなるセールスチームの中心的存在としてお客様対応のフロントに立ち、またセールスチームを纏め上げるリーダーシップが必要とされる職種です。お客様にかかわる様々な営業メンバーと連携し、お客様へのアプローチを致しますが、最初の商談から案件受注までのお客様対応を一貫して ISR が対応します。 デルでの 3 か月は他社での 1 年とよく言われますが、お客様窓口のフロントに立って経験を積むことで社会人として、さらには営業職としてハイスピードで成長ができます。 内勤営業の仕組みはデルが 30 年以上前から培ったものですが、昨今は国内の大手企業やベンチャー企業でも同様のスキームを真似て導入する企業が増えています。 ＜営業スタイル＞ CSB は従業員 100 名未満の法人のお客様を中心にビジネス展開しております。 マーケティングチーム発信のダイレクトメールから創出されたお客様のデマンドを最大化させるインバウンド型のビジネスモデル、デルの長年の直販ビジネスから蓄積されたデータをもとに効果的な営業活動を行うアウトバウンド型のビジネスモデル、これら 2 軸を駆使して日本国内の中小企業やベンチャー、スタートアップ企業の成長を IT 化の側面から支援しております。 提案する商材は PC ・周辺機器のみならず、サーバー・ストレージ、セキュリティソリューションと多岐に渡ります。 変化の激しい IT 業界の中でもデルは最先端の価値を提供しており、お客様の IT 課題をあらゆる側面から解決する方法を提案できます。スピード感のある環境下で成長したいという意欲をお持ちの方のご応募をお待ちしております！ Qualifications 個人もしくは法人営業経験者 IT 業界での営業経験があれば尚可 発注納期管理業務経験 基本的な PC スキル（ Excel, Word, Outlook) ビジネスレベルの英語力があることが望ましい（なくても応募可能） ハードウェア・ソフトウエアの知識がある方歓迎 応募期限：2024年2月29日 ◆ カジュアル面談 ◆   応募 を 悩まれ てい る方、 ポジションや会社 概要 についてまずは お 話を聞いてみたい 方は カジュアル面談 をご活用ください。   カジュアル面談は 選考ではありません 。 採用担当者とざっくばらん に話 し、 ご 経験やご希望 に合致するポジション 、気になっていること をご確認 いただけます 。     面談 の お申込みは こちら 　     ◆ ダイバーシティの推進 ◆   私たちは 、 2030年まで に 、 「 性 自認が女性である 人が世界中の社員の50%、​管理職の40% を占める 」 という 目標を 掲げ て 日々取り組んでいます。 さまざまなアイデンティティや バックグラウンドを持つ 人 たち が集まり、 誰も が 力を発揮 して活躍 できるカルチャー を 育んでいます。     女性のキャリア支援について詳しくは   Women a t Dell Japan 　をご覧ください。     デル・テクノロジーズについて   デル・テクノロジーズは、個人と組織の働き方・暮らしの変革を支援するユニークな企業です。 社員 一人ひとり の 影響力を信じ 、 すべての取り組み において 社員 を最優先に考えます 。I T 業界で 最先端のテクノロジー を学び、 経験を積む 成長 機会を 求め てい る 方はぜひご応募ください。 進歩に向かって共に前へ進みませんか。     Job ID: R239040 Dell’s Flexible & Hybrid Work Culture At Dell Technologies, we believe our best work is done when flexibility is offered. Job Description: EMEA Services Solutions Principal for Data, Data Science, AI/GenAI & ML  Are you an experienced Services Solutions Principal who could provide presales advices for  game-changing, enterprise-wide Data, Data Science, AI/GenAI & ML Transformation services? Be part of an EMEA team of Solutions Principals and work on opportunities across EMEA. You will also support the country-based Services Solutions Principals with your subject matter expertise. What you’ll achieve As a Data Security Architect, you will be responsible for engaging stakeholders with diverse perspectives on needed capabilities and perform research and analysis to provide recommendations to Cybersecurity Leadership.  You will work closely with business partners, peer architects, engineers, consultants and other stakeholders across the enterprise with cross-functional demands to provide Data Security strategies, roadmaps, architectures, and program related items to improve our data security posture across the globe. Accounting Senior Analyst We are a global, multi-billion-dollar corporation – and Accounting is vital to reflecting our staggering earnings, profits, cash balances and other financial results. To meet this, we implement best practices, provide general financial support, resolve queries, prepare reports and provide statistics. We also design policies and procedures that adhere to audit standards and conform to FASB and SEC guidance, as well as compliance with GAAP and Sarbanes-Oxley section 404. Join us as a  Senior Analyst  in our  Accounting  team in  Bucharest  to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact.   What you’ll achieve As a Senior Accounting Analyst, you will be in charge with auditing transactions posted from Dell’s bank accounts to the general ledger. This role is a high-volume transaction processing accounting role. You will validate that transactions related to customer collections, refunds, channel partner payments, and other cash agree to the sub-ledger transactions. You will work across the business with Cash Services, Treasury, Funding and Global Financial Services teams  You will: •    Evaluate and interpret complex situations/ problems using multiple sources of information (qualitative information, quantitative research, trend data); Screen, categorize, evaluate, reconcile, report and resolve data integrity issues •    Interpret generally defined practices and methods •    Responsible of period end close processes related to cash and cash clearing, including posting transactions that the sub-ledger systems do not post systematically, and posting month-end adjustments. •    Monitor and analyse P&L and Balance sheet transactions and ensure their correctness, deal with eventual discrepancies; review and confirm the overall correctness of P&L and BS statements as they relate to Cash and Cash Clearing;  •    Preparation General Ledger Account Reconciliations, review and follow up and prepare and provide clear and understandable flux commentaries on Balance Sheet movements   Take the first step towards your dream career Every Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table. Here’s what we are looking for with this role: Essential Requirements •    Good communication skills and collaboration with people at all levels; good understanding of accounting principles, concepts, theories, technologies and standards of professional field •    Good working knowledge and demonstrated ability utilizing multiple systems, tools and procedures to accomplish job; ability to build deeper understanding of processes, procedures, customers and organization •    Bachelor’s degree in Accounting and 2-3 years of experience in accounting or audit •    Very good knowledge of MS Excel •    Experience in general bank cash, cash disbursement, cash clearing and similar type reconciliation accounting a plus;  Desirable Requirements •    Previous experience working in a multinational corporation •    Knowledge of US GAAP   Who we are  We believe that each of us has the power to make an impact. 2024 Sales Operations Intern Our Sales Operations team is at the heart of developing sales processes and procedures for administering, fulfilling and communicating both online and offline orders. A bridge between sales and other operational functions, we use our peerless expertise to evaluate and implement improvements to sales programs and processes – from planning and prioritization to pricing and margin strategies, sales automation, reporting and more. Put simply, we make sure the process of getting our ground-breaking products and services to customers as simple and seamless as possible.  Join us as a Sales Operations Intern on our  Sales operation  team in Xiamen   to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact. What you’ll achieve As a Sales Operations Intern, you will support business analytics and opportunity tracking for Services Sales for Greater China or the Asia Pacific and Japan and for the segment/country assigned. You will: Run-The-Business and business management system for Services Sales and driving Sales tools usage via training and enablemen Gap Analysis & tactical business recovery plans for areas not doing well and drive sales behavior through training, contests, programs and enablement Sales Training and Development and Strategic / Stretch Goal setting, tracking and reporting Own sales programme with partnership with Programme manager, Business manager and Marketing to drive global and regional initiatives locally Coordination/Administrative  tasks as required to support the business Take the first step towards your dream career Every Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table. Our company is made up of more than 150,000 people, located in over 180 locations around the world. We’re proud to be a diverse and inclusive team and have an endless passion for our mission to drive human progress. What’s most important to us is that you are respected, feel like you can be yourself and have the opportunity to do the best work of your life -- while still having a life. We offer excellent benefits, bonus programs, flexible work arrangements, a variety of career development opportunities, employee resource groups, and much more. We started with computers, but we didn’t stop there. We are helping customers move into the future with multi-cloud, AI and machine learning through the most innovative technology and services portfolio for the data era. Join us and become a part of what’s next in technology, starting today. NextGen Presales Academy - Associate Solutions Architect (f/m/d)       Vienna, Austria or remote (based in Austria) At Dell Technologies, we are committed to creating innovative technologies that drive human progress. Our goal is to help our customers thrive in this constantly evolving digital world by delivering essential technology solutions to help move them forward. Powered by a workforce that values and celebrates different backgrounds, we create solutions that harness and amplify technology in the most meaningful ways. From hybrid cloud and high-performance computing to ambitious social impact and sustainability initiatives, what we do impacts everyone, everywhere. Join us as an  Associate Solutions Architect  in our  Pre-Sales  team in  Vienna  or  remote (based in Austria)  to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact. What you’ll achieve:                                                                                                   The Dell Technologies  NextGen Presales Academy  is a  15 – 30-month experiential training  program designed to develop early-in-career & recent university graduates into skilled  Presales Solutions Architects . The role of a  Presales Solutions Architect  blends the art of sales with the science of technology. We strive to act as trusted advisors to our customers to help recommend and design technology-based products and solutions. Following the program, participants will progress into a role as part of an industry leading presales organization where they will work with sales teams to help customers accomplish their IT initiatives and solve business challenges. You  w ill: Develop your knowledge of Dell Technologies’ data center solutions.   Develop professional consultative skills used to gather customer requirements and IT environment specifics.   Work with diverse teams and individuals to collaboratively architect unique solutions that drive customer innovation using cutting-edge technologies.   Learn, practice & deliver presentations & demos to customers, highlighting product features, benefits & business value.   Study the latest trends such as Cloud Computing, DevOps, Data Security and Artificial Intelligence which are changing how customers deploy and operate IT infrastructure & applications.   Take the first step towards your dream career. Every Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table. Here’s what we are looking for with this role: Essential  r equirements: Proven technology skills, outstanding interpersonal abilities, strong written and verbal communication skills in German and English.   Attention to detail and problem-solving capabilities.   Being an innovative thinker and a self-starter with a desire-to-win type mindset.   Undergraduate Degree in a technical or business-related field.   Desirable Requirements:  Internship or work experience in technology-related field or a technology company.   Minimum salary (yearly): from 56.400 €, salary split: 70/30, 70% base salary/30% variable salary. VAT Analyst Dell Technologies is a global, multi-billion-dollar corporation, so our Tax team has a huge task in ensuring that we meet our tax obligations. It’s a wide-ranging area – from tax research, planning and compliance, through to developing and implementing systems to support data collection, analysis, preparation and submission. Whether preparing and completing tax returns and reports, catching up with the latest developments in tax law or answering enquiries from a host of internal and external customers, we’re always switched on and on top of our game. Join us to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact as a  VAT Analyst  on our  Tax Team  in  Slovakia . What you’ll achieve As a  VAT Analyst  you will be responsible for preparation of VAT returns for EMEA countries and related reporting (VIES, Intrastat). You will participate in the maintenance of tax records to ensure compliance with relevant tax regulations. You will: Monitor and analyze proposed and newly enacted tax legislation, regulations and judicial decisions that impact Dell’s operations and financial Participate in tax audits and in the preparation of supporting documentation Handle the processing, reporting, validation, inquiries, and disputes from both internal and external customers related to tax liability Ensure Dell’s compliance with tax laws and adherence to policies and internal controls within area of specialty while minimizing Dell’s liability Take the first step towards your dream career Every Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table. Here’s what we are looking for with this role: Essential Requirements Tax/accounting experience or Masters degree in these fields Communicative English - verbal & written Advanced Excel Orientation in details, ability to meet deadlines Salary starting from:  1 350 EUR gross/month Here’s our story; now tell us yours Dell Technologies helps organizations and individuals build a brighter digital tomorrow. Tax Senior Analyst Dell Technologies is a global, multi-billion-dollar corporation, so our Tax team has a huge task in ensuring that we meet our tax obligations. It’s a wide-ranging area – from tax research, planning and compliance, through to developing and implementing systems to support data collection, analysis, preparation and submission. Whether preparing and completing tax returns and reports, catching up with the latest developments in tax law or answering enquiries from a host of internal and external customers, we’re always switched on and on top of our game. Join us to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact as a  Tax Senior Analyst  on our  Tax team  in  Bratislava, Slovakia. You will work with statutory accountants and external tax advisors on annual corporate tax returns. Job Title: Senior Analyst, Material Planning (2024 Master's Fresh Graduate)
Job Description: Material Planning Senior Analyst Dell’s is one of the Best Run Supply Chain’s in the world - renowned for its efficiency and speed of execution. Dell pioneered the Dell Direct Model enabled by a supply chain that generated significant cost and speed efficiencies. Over the last few years, Dell has enabled numerous other sales channels including retail and manufacturing with partner ODMs. The Dell SC is getting transformed with multiple modes of manufacturing and fulfillment to service demands from different customer segments. GPP Nerve Center is at the heart of Dell’s Global Supply Chain Operations enabling and monitoring the execution of end to end supply chain on a daily basis. Nerve Center is responsible for planning and governance of key areas like weekly and quarterly shipments, backlog levels, Customer experience metrics, etc and monitoring and analysis of all key supply chain metrics ranging from demand planning to customer delivery. The key objective is to help Dell’s global operations to streamline processes, cut costs and improve efficiencies. The team has a very strong pool of talent coming from premier schools and industries and possesses diverse expertise and skill sets. Join us to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact as a Material Planning Senior Analyst on our Material Planning Team in Singapore. What you’ll achieve As a Material Planning Senior Analyst, you will be responsible for ensuring continuity of supply to enable customer demand is always met, maintaining strong and effective supply chains. You will: Drive daily actions in-order to meet strategic supply chain KPIs Partner with cross-functional teams globally (Factory, Engineering, Procurement, IT, demand planning and logistics) to deliver supply chain results Raise visibility against supply chain health with the right level of detail and drive actions & Build capabilities to look around corners for potential supply chain disruption through analysis and able to recommend solutions Deliver high quality executive reporting – daily, weekly, monthly, quarterly Adapt projects, programs or methods based on customer or business partner feedback Take the first step towards your dream career Every Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table. Here’s what we are looking for with this role: Essential Requirements Great capability to drive day to day supply chain activities/reporting’s. Excellent Microsoft excel skills Good data management and use of digital tools/applications Strong eye for details, analytical and comfortable in working with numbers to develop applications. Good articulation / communication (written and verbal) and presentation skills Desirable Requirements Solid knowledge of Database Systems, Data Visualization Tools, Data Modelling Tools, Business Intelligence and Web Development AND Possess strong coding knowledge for .Net Programming, JavaScript (JS), R, Python, SQL, Power BI, Tableau Masters/Bachelor’s OR in Supply Chain Who we are We believe that each of us has the power to make an impact. Job Title: Data Science Consultant- AI Product Manager
Job Description: AI Product Manager Data Science is all about breaking new ground to enable businesses to answer their most urgent questions. Pioneering massively parallel data-intensive analytic processing, our mission is to develop a whole new approach to generating meaning and value from petabyte-scale data sets and shape brand new methodologies, tools, statistical methods and models. What’s more, we are in collaboration with leading academics, industry experts and highly skilled engineers to equip our customers to generate sophisticated new insights from the biggest of big data.   Join us to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact as an  AI Product Manager  on our Data Science CoE in  Bangalore . What you’ll achieve As a Senior AI Product Manager, you will lead the strategic development and delivery of AI-centric products, utilizing your deep expertise in Generative AI, Large Language Models (LLMs), Deep Learning, and Reinforcement Learning. Your technical skills will guide  MLOps  implementation and product design, while your leadership will foster cross-functional collaboration. You'll identify market opportunities, translating these into product requirements, while balancing short-term execution with long-term strategy. Besides navigating technical complexities, your role extends to stakeholder management, ensuring product alignment with company objectives. This includes liaising with sales and marketing teams for go-to-market strategies, leading customer engagement initiatives, and presenting regular updates to senior management. Your dual focus on technical excellence and business strategy will be pivotal in delivering innovative, user-centric AI products that drive our company's success. You will: Utilize your understanding of Generative AI, LLMs, Deep Learning, and Reinforcement Learning to develop strategic product roadmaps. Evaluate market trends and competitor offerings to identify opportunities for innovation .  Also  Utilize popular AI, ML, and DL frameworks such as TensorFlow,  PyTorch , and  Keras  to help guide product development . Oversee the complete product life cycle, from conception through development, launch, and post-launch optimization. Collaborate with the engineering team to ensure the development of high-quality AI-driven products in line with defined objectives . Regularly provide leadership with updates on product development progress, market trends, and potential challenges. Make informed recommendations based on data-driven insights . Coordinate with the engineering team to integrate  MLOps  practices into product development. Understand and contribute to system design, ensuring that products are scalable, robust, and maintainable . Supervise and assist the team in executing Proof of Concepts (POCs) that demonstrate the value and potential of your research to the organization and Proactively engage in the patent creation process to safeguard the organization's intellectual property rights . Take the first step towards your dream career. Every Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table. Here’s what we are looking for with this role:   Essential Requirements Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, AI, Machine Learning, or a related field with 12+ year of Proven experience as a Data Engineer or similar role. Solid background in Data Science and Software Engineering with in-depth understanding of database indexing and data modelling. Experience in python, microservices and usage of APIs ( Flask , Fast API etc. )  Proficiency in implementing ETL processes, methodologies, and tools. Desirable Requirements Solid knowledge of cloud environments, such as AWS, GCP, or Azure. Experience with containerization technologies like Docker and orchestration systems like Kubernetes. Job Title: Product Operations Principal Engineer (Operation project manager)
Job Description: When Dell Technologies launches new game-changing products into the global market, Product Operations Engineering has a vital role to play. The team coordinates all the operational activities that enable products to be introduced and sustained successfully. It’s about making sure there is consistency between production and test environments. It’s about ensuring hardware, software and networking changes are migrated into the production environment in a stable and controlled way. And it’s about creating build processes, coordinating product builds for release into production and setting up configuration specifications for releases. Join us to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact as a  Product Operations Principal Engineer  on our  Product Operations Engineering  team in  Hanoi, Vietnam . What you’ll achieve As a  Product Operations Principal Engineer , you will be responsible for  P providing coordination of operational activities associated with the introduction of a new product worldwide. Coordinates all operational activities associated with the introduction of the new product. Responsible for ensuring stable, controlled migration of hardware, software and networking changes into the production environment. Ensures consistency between production and test environments. Creates/maintains build processes, coordinates product builds for release into production, prioritizes failures and works with development to resolve problems. Sets up configuration specifications for releases. Represents Worldwide Operations from a product perspective. Creates factory strategies and plans for Worldwide Operations based on product plans and roadmaps. Utilizes metrics to improve new production, introduction process and product quality, at launch and throughout life of the program. Ensures Operations achieves Ready to Ship Release and transactions into  production/sustaining.  Transitions products from theOLP process to the sustaining phase. Drives action plans and strategies to reduce overall manufacturing transformation cost. Drives quality improvements by eliminating sources of defects in the design, supplier, new product introduction and manufacturing processes. Drives continuous improvement inOLP process, product manufacturability and flexibility, and operations cycle time and quality. Take the first step towards your dream career Every Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table. Here’s what we are looking for with this role: Essential Requirements 8+ years of relevant experience or equivalent combination of education and work experience. Having wide-ranging experience, uses professional concepts and company objectives to resolve complex issues in creative and effective ways. Some barriers to entry exist at this level (i.e., dept/peer review). Works on complex issues where analysis of situations or data requires an in-depth evaluation of variable factors.. Exercises judgment in selecting methods, techniques and evaluation criteria for obtaining results. Internal and external contacts often pertain to company plans and objectives. Works on issues where analysis of situations or data requires an in-depth knowledge of organizational objectives, as well as an understanding of company protocol. Implements strategic policies when selecting methods, techniques, and evaluation criteria for obtaining results.. Establishes and assures adherence to budgets, schedules, work plans and performance requirements.​ Desirable Requirements Senior management reviews objectives to determine success of operation. Involved in developing, modifying and executing company policies that affect immediate operations(s) and may also have company-wide effect. Worum geht es?     STEM Aspire  ist ein Mentoren Programm für weibliche Studierende,  welches Studentinnen mit Mentoren von  Dell Technologies  zusammenbringt.      STEM steht dabei für Science, Technology, Engineering und  Mathematics  – in Deutschland besser beka nnt als  MINT.  Wir von Dell möchten zusätzlich auch Studentinnen aus dem Economics ( Wi Wi )-Bereich unterstützen.     Ziel des Programms ist es, enthusiastische Studentinnen  aus wirtschaftswissenschaftlichen und  MINT-Studiengängen zu ermutigen und zu befähigen, eine lohnende Karriere im Technologiesektor zu machen. Mögliche Bereiche sind  BWL, VWL,  Informatik, Softwaretechnik, BIS, Netzwerktechnik, Cybersicherheit, IT-Management oder verwandte Gebiete.   Der nächste Durchgang des STEM Aspire Mentoren Programm findet im Zeitraum  vom  1 7 . April 2024 bis  25 . Juli 2024  statt.     Das bieten wir dir:    Möglichkeit regelmäßige r  1:1- Coachings  mit deiner Mentorin , um dein Verständnis für die IT-Branche zu vertiefen und einen Einblick in die Karriere deiner Mentorin zu gewinnen     Einblick in  die Karrieremöglichkeiten b ei  Dell Technologies   Aufbau eines Netzwerks mit e rfolgreichen Frauen  bei Dell Technologies  und  Peers aus dem Programm   Workshops zu unterschiedlichen Themen, w ie „ Build   your   brand “,  K I -  und Coaching- Session   Unterstützung bei der Vorbereitung von Bewerbungen     Was musst du mitbringen ?     Al s weibliche Studentin in den Bereichen Wirtschaftswissenschaften oder MINT, die bereits mindestens das erste Semester abgeschlossen hat, kannst du dich für das Programm bewerben.     Wie kannst du dich bewerben ?     Bewirb dich auf diese Stelle, indem du deinen  kurzen  Lebenslauf   hochlädst, d er  die folgenden  Informationen  abdeckt:    D ein  Name,  deine  Hochschule , deinen  Studiengang     Start und voraussichtliches Ende deines Studiums     Wir kontaktieren dich dann in nerhalb von 14 Tagen, um das weitere Vorgehen mit dir zu besprechen.   Bewerbungsschluss  ist der 31. März 2024.   Was wird von dir erwartet ?     Mindestens einmal im Monat  Austausch  mit  de iner  Mentor in  (virtuell oder persönlich, je nach Entscheidung  des Mentee  / Mentor-Paares)    Teilnahme an untenstehenden Veranstaltungen im Rahmen des Programms   Folgende Veranstaltungstermine haben wir  für dich geplant  (Termine können sich kurzfristig noch ändern) :     17. April 2024 ab 13  Uhr  –    Eröffnungsveranstaltung  mit „ Build   your   brand “ und  „# Iamremarkable “-Workshop  (live vor Ort / virtuell)   15. Mai 2024  ab  13  Uhr  –    KI-Workshop   ( virtuell)   07. Juni 2024  ab 10  U hr  –    Coaching Workshop  ( virtuell )   25. Juli 2024  ab  13  Uhr  –    Abschlussv eranstaltung  mit Vortrag zum Thema „Environmental and  Social   Governance “  (live vor Ort / virtuell)     *Mit der Einreichung deiner Bewerbung meldest du dich für das Programm an. Es handelt sich nicht um ein Stellenangebot, und diese Bewerbung führt nicht zu einem Einstellungsverfahren bei Dell Technologies.   *Bitte beachte, dass du uns mit deiner Anmeldung die Erlaubnis gibst, deine Kontaktdaten für maximal 12 Monate zu speichern.     Vielen Dank und wir freuen uns auf  eure  Bewerbungen,      d as  S TEM  Aspire Team  Deutsch land     Wer wir sind:       Wir glauben, dass jeder von uns die Chance hat etwas zu bewirken. Deshalb stellen wir unsere Teammitglieder in den Mittelpunkt unseres Handelns. Wenn du auf der Suche nach einer Möglichkeit bist, deine Karriere mit den besten Köpfen und der fortschrittlichsten Technologie der Branche voranzutreiben, dann bist du bei uns genau richtig.     Dell Technologies ist eine einzigartige Unternehmensfamilie, die Einzelpersonen und Organisationen dabei hilft, die Art und Weise, wie sie arbeiten, leben und spielen, zu verändern. Arbeite mit uns an einer Zukunft, die für alle funktioniert, denn der Fortschritt braucht uns alle  hier .       Dell Technologies hat sich dem Grundsatz der Chancengleichheit bei der Beschäftigung aller Mitarbeitenden verschrieben und bemüht sich, den  Mitarbeiter:Innen  ein Arbeitsumfeld zu bieten, das frei von Diskriminierung und Belästigung ist. Job Title: Data Engineer II – Customer Growth Marketing
Job Description: Data Engineer II - Customer Growth Marketing Do you want to solve some of the hardest problems for business leveraging ML/AI? Do you want to learn how to build algorithms that scale – most of our use cases start with 10 million+ rows of data. Our data scientists & engineers are helping to shape our marketing strategy for a digital world. Join us to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact as a  Data Engineer II - Customer Growth Marketing  on our  Data Engineering  team in  Bratislava, Slovakia . What you'll achieve The models and solutions you deliver will be the essential ingredient we use to supply our customers & sales with relevant product recommendations and creative breakthroughs to our business. We offer you a fast-paced work environment in a diverse team with exposure to Dell teams across the globe. You will be part of a dynamic, collaborative and cross-functional team focused on making significant business impacts. You will: Feature engineering: Stitching together and aggregation of multiple large data sets working with the data scientist to a desired format. You will need to optimize both queries and architecture to support big data sets. SQL is usually the preferred language, but some Spark jobs are necessary. Data pipelining: Once the initial dataset are prepared, it is normally run through a further pipeline to prepare it for modelling. Here you will create features that make ML/AI algorithms work (e.g. translating text into category variables). Python/R is usually the preferred language. Work with other engineers and data scientists to solve some of the hardest business problems. Learn what it takes to build, deploy & scale ML/AI models in real-world. Build analytical data sets on which model’s will be built. This would entail two key tasks – feature engineering on large datasets and optimization of our pipelines to drive scalability. Take the first step towards your dream career  Every Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table. Here’s what we are looking for with this role: Essential Requirements:  Solid SQL Knowledge. Education (Bachelor’s degree or higher) in Computer Science, Mathematics, or a related technical field, or equivalent practical experience Attention to detail, Attention to detail, Critical thinking and open to learn. Willing to mentor junior team members. You have professional experience. 5+ years of experience in Data or BI engineering dealing with large complex data scenarios Desirable requirements: Skills in Python or other programming skills. Proven ability to work with varied data infrastructures – including relational databases, Data Warehouses, column stores, NoSQL databases, and file-based storage solutions. Exposure to Software engineering and machine learning or machine learning pipelines is a plus. Job Description: 2024  校园招聘   售前技术工程师实习生 即使在数字领域具有开创性的产品也不能做到自我销售。在戴尔，我们下定决心要为每一个客户及合作伙伴提供高品质的一流体验。这种体验首先从我们开创性的技术产品组合开始，即客户端解决方案、高端电子设备、配件、移动产品、企业解决方案、服务和软件包。内部销售团队为我们的技术产品组合注入了活力。开发持久的关系、建立和谐的环境并依靠自身完美无瑕的交流技巧，通过电话、 Web 和电子邮件向客户销售产品，这是该团队引以为傲的资本。   在 成都 的 内部销售团队 中以 售前技术支持工程师实习生 的身份加入我们，您将与业界顶尖的人员一同共事并产生深远的社会影响。   售前技术支持工程师将运用他们的技术与行业知识，与内部销售客户经理团队紧密合作，推动与客户的合作，实现产品解决方案的销售。   关键职责 ·          熟悉企业级产品，包括服务器、存储、网络、虚拟化等，以及掌握企业级解决方案：云计算、大数据、人工智能，边缘计算、现代化数据中心等前沿技术。 ·          作为技术售前工程师，通过电话 / 邮件等方式与客户交流，充分理解客户需求，推荐并讲解公司产品和技术解决方案。 ·          具有比较全面的技术专业知识，熟悉技术、行业、市场动向，能够发现潜在商机 ·          了解和学习世界 500 强企业领先的管理方式、业务模式和解决方案。 ·          通过团队合作赢取客户订单，学习销售策略，掌握销售流程基本要求 : 基本要求 : ·          良好的沟通能力和学习能力 ·          对销售 / 售前岗位高度热忱 ·          计算机专业优先考虑 ·         2025届  本科或研究生学历 戴尔科技集团旗下拥有多家企业，面向客户提供各种创新技术和服务产品组合，旨在助力组织和个人构建数字化未来并实现工作、生活和娱乐方式转型。客户至上、互利共赢、积极创新、追求成效、诚信经营是我们的准则。加入我们独具魅力的大家庭，体验崇尚多元化和包容性的企业文化，享受颇具竞争力的薪酬、奖励方案、优厚福利以及宝贵的学习和发展机会，轻松拓展职业生涯。 了解 我们如何弥合多元化差距。 截止日期： 2024 年 6 月  30 日 戴尔秉持所有员工工作机会平等的原则，致力于为员工提供 ⼀个无歧视、无骚扰的工作环境。戴尔的所有雇用决策基于业务需求、工作要求以及资历，与⺠族、肤色、宗教或信仰、国籍、出身或种族、性别（包括怀孕）、年龄、身体、精神或知觉障碍、 HIV 状况、性取向、性别认同和 / 或表达、婚姻、民事结合或同居伴侣关系状况、过去或现在的兵役、家族病史或遗传信息、家庭或 ⽗⺟状况或任何其他受我们运营地点的法律法规保护的状况无关。戴尔决不容忍基于任何上述特征的歧视或骚扰。单 击 此处 ，了解有关戴尔多元化和包容性文化的详细信息。 Job ID: R228782 Dell’s Flexible & Hybrid Work Culture At Dell Technologies, we believe our best work is done when flexibility is offered. We know that freedom and flexibility are crucial to all our employees no matter where you are located and our flexible and hybrid work style allows team members to have the freedom to ideate, be innovative, and drive results their way. To learn more about our work culture, please visit our  locations  page.

Job Title: Principal Software Engineer C++ Windows - Secureworks
Job Description: Windows Sensor Principal Software Engineer About Secureworks Secureworks (NASDAQ: SCWX) is a global cybersecurity leader that secures human progress with Secureworks® Taegis™, a SaaS-based, open XDR platform built on 20+ years of real-world threat intelligence and research, improving customers’ ability to detect advanced threats, streamline and collaborate on investigations, and automate the right actions. We enjoy competitive compensation and benefits packages, and reward and recognize our employees for exceptional results. A constant focus on continued learning and growth keeps our team members engaged and excited about “what’s next.” We offer flexible work options when available, and emphasize the importance of work-life balance. We know that when our people are rewarded, recognized, and rejuvenated, we win as a team. Role Overview Taegis Endpoint Agent is cross-platform product and a vital part of our XDR platform. The agent plays the crucial role of detecting malicious behavior and other activities to feed data into the cloud for further threat analysis. With the help of threat intelligence gathered by our world class security researchers and powered by amazing threat analytics platform we are able to detect threats and secure our clients infrastructure. We are looking for a Principal Software Engineer with strong knowledge of Windows systems to drive the next-generation endpoint capabilities of our new product offerings. You will work in a fast-paced, startup-like environment with an experienced, cross-functional team of software engineers, data scientists, and security experts to develop our next generation endpoint sensor that seamlessly integrates with our cloud-native security analytics platform.  If you love computer security and digging into complex engineering challenges, then we want your help securing human progress! Role Responsibilities Develop software with high concurrency and reliability requirements and low/no impact to end users.   Participate in Design and Technical discussions around architecture, strategy, and development of next generation threat detection and response capabilities. Follow Test-driven Development to ensure highest quality. Ensure high standards are being followed when it comes to design, coding quality, along with unit and component testing. Triage, reproduce, debug, and fix issues identified in the product. Build tools to support team efficiency and contribute to test automation. Work effectively on a geographically distributed team to deliver high quality software against aggressive schedules.    Mentor and influence other team members and guide to perform at an outstanding level Minimum Requirements Strong experience and knowledge in C++ Experience in Windows OS User-mode or Kernel-mode Development Solid knowledge with low-level OS internals Experience in debugging and solving application crashes, performance Experience developing applications using concurrency with the use of strong multi-threading Preferred Skills Experience with Windows CI/CD including installers, updaters, packaging, and signing. Experience with software security areas including encryption, authentication, offensive and/or defensive techniques. OS system expertise for core concepts and subsystems Familiarity and experience with Agile process Good knowledge and experience working with WFP filters Experience working with Cloud applications Experience with Malware research and reverse engineering is a plus   Secureworks is committed to the principle of equal employment opportunity for all employees and to providing employees with a work environment free of discrimination and harassment. All employment decisions at Secureworks are based on business needs, job requirements and individual qualifications, without regard to race, color, religion or belief, national, social or ethnic origin, sex (including pregnancy), age, physical, mental or sensory disability, HIV status, sexual orientation, gender identity and/or expression, marital, civil union or domestic partnership status, past or present military service, family medical history or genetic information, family or parental status, or any other status protected by the laws or regulations in the locations where we operate. Secureworks will not tolerate discrimination or harassment based on any of these characteristics. Job Title: Statistical & Machine Learning / AI Data Scientist Advisor
Job Description: Statistical & Machine Learning / AI Data Scientist Advisor/Sr. Advisor Data Science is all about breaking new ground to enable businesses to answer their most urgent questions. Pioneering massively parallel data-intensive analytic processing, our mission is to develop a whole new approach to generating meaning and value from petabyte-scale data sets and shape brand new methodologies, tools, statistical methods and models. What’s more, we are in collaboration with leading academics, industry experts and highly skilled engineers to equip our customers to generate sophisticated new insights from the biggest of big data. Join us to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact as a  Statistical & Machine Learning / AI Data Scientist Advisor  on our  Data Engineering  Team in  Bratislava, Slovakia . What You’ll Achieve As a  Statistical & Machine Learning / AI Data Scientist Advisor , you should have experience in analyzing data and building models on a large scale. You should have solid business and communication skills to be able to work with business owners to develop and define key business questions and to build modeling solutions that answer those questions. We expect you to be familiar with most of the standard methods: linear regression, logistic regression, regularized regressions, nearest neighbors, k-means, decision tree-based algorithms (random forest, extreme gradient boosting), neural networks and/or deep learning. However, it is also important to be curious about the latest trends in data science and creative in applying/implementing new methods or combinations of them to our data. You will have the opportunity to demonstrate and develop your analytical and technical skills with challenging projects and work with experienced data scientists and data/ML engineers. Expect to expand your skills in Python / R and apply machine learning techniques to large datasets. We offer you a fast-paced work environment in a diverse team with exposure to Dell teams across the globe. You will be part of a dynamic, collaborative and cross-functional team focused on making significant business impacts. You will: Drive discussions to frame problem statements, develop hypotheses, design data frames, recommend modeling approaches, measure success & testing criteria Establish scalable, efficient, automated processes for large scale feature engineering, model development, model validation and production Communicate with product teams and leadership and turn hard and abstract into simple and approachable Take the first step towards your dream career  Every Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table. Here’s what we are looking for with this role: Essential Requirements: You have 3+ years of professional experience in predictive modeling and analysis, designing and implementing solutions to drive business outcomes. Education (Master’s degree or higher) in Statistics, Computer Science, Mathematics, or a related technical field, or equivalent practical experience. Proficiency in SQL and Python/R especially on data wrangling, analysis, modeling and ability to build scalable machine learning pipelines. Excellent problem solving, analytic skills, knowledge of core statistical concepts and English communication skills. Advanced knowledge of data science methods (Decision Tree/Regression based methods, Clustering, etc.) Desirable Requirements: Experience with methods and technologies such as NLP and deep learning (Keras, Tensorflow, Pytorch). Software engineering experience particularly related to productionizing machine learning models and scaling them in low-latency settings (Docker, Airflow, MLFlow, CI/CD). Salary starting from:  2 660 Euro/gross monthly Who we are   We believe that each of us has the power to make an impact. That’s why we put our team members at the center of everything we do. If you’re looking for an opportunity to grow your career with some of the best minds and most advanced tech in the industry, we’re looking for you. Dell Technologies is a unique family of businesses that helps individuals and organizations transform how they work, live and play. Join us to build a future that works for everyone because Progress Takes All of Us. Growth Marketing Software Engineer Data Science is all about breaking new ground to enable businesses to answer their most urgent questions. Pioneering massively parallel data-intensive analytic processing, our mission is to develop a whole new approach to generating meaning and value from petabyte-scale data sets and shape brand new methodologies, tools, statistical methods and models. What’s more, we are in collaboration with leading academics, industry experts and highly skilled engineers to equip our customers to generate sophisticated new insights from the biggest of big data. Join us to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact as a  Growth Marketing Software Engineer  on our  Data Engineering  Team in  Bratislava, Slovakia  What you’ll achieve As a Growth Marketing Software Engineer, you’ll be responsible for interaction with business leaders and internal customers to create and establish design standards and assurance processes for software, systems and applications development to ensure compatibility and operability. You’ll also analyze business goals, defines project scope and identifies functional and technical requirements to produce accurate business insights. You will: Participate in communication with end users and business teams to define software/data requirements and specifications and identify user issues. Partner with both internal & external sources to design, build and oversee the deployment and operation of technology architecture, solutions, and software. Work in collaboration with data engineers, data scientists, architects and business teams to design strategic projects and break complex problems into actionable tasks. Develop software to transform and use data, automate processes, provide user interfaces for end users, improve the efficiency of our codebase, and maintain and debug infrastructure systems. Review and implement test strategies for software products. Take the first step towards your dream career Every Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table. Here’s what we are looking for with this role: Essential Requirements : Proven experience with the following frontend and backend technologies: JavaScript, jQuery, HTML, CSS, Nodejs, Express.js, RESTful APIs. Proven experience working with Python in the context of Automation, Web Scraping, Data Analysis, Data Exploration and/or Machine Learning. Good practical knowledge of Relational databases (any of the following: PostgreSQL, Greenplum, Redshift, RDS, Oracle, MySQL). Knowledge of NoSQL databases is a plus. Growth Marketing Big Data Engineer Data Science is all about breaking new ground to enable businesses to answer their most urgent questions. Pioneering massively parallel data-intensive analytic processing, our mission is to develop a whole new approach to generating meaning and value from petabyte-scale data sets and shape brand new methodologies, tools, statistical methods and models. What’s more, we are in collaboration with leading academics, industry experts and highly skilled engineers to equip our customers to generate sophisticated new insights from the biggest of big data. Join us to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact as a  Growth Marketing Big Data Engineer  on our  Data Engineering  team in  Bratislava, Slovakia . What you’ll achieve As a Growth Marketing Big Data Engineer, you will deliver models and solutions that will be the essential ingredient, we use to supply our customers & sales with relevant product recommendations and creative breakthroughs to our business. You will work with other engineers and data scientists to solve some of the hardest business problems. You will learn what it takes to build, deploy & scale ML/AI models in real-world (it’s a hard problem, we assure you). You will build analytical data sets on which model’s will be built. This would entail two key tasks – feature engineering on large datasets and optimization of our pipelines to drive scalability. If you are already good at it, we will make you better. You will: Feature engineering: Stitching together and aggregation of multiple large data sets working with the data scientist to a desired format. You will need to optimize both queries and architecture to support big data sets. SQL is usually the preferred language, but some NoSQL or Spark jobs are necessary Implement complex Data pipelining / ETL process: Once the initial dataset are prepared, it is normally run through a further pipeline to prepare it for modelling. Here you will create features that make ML/AI algorithms work (e.g., translating text into category variables). Python/R is usually the preferred language Develop and maintain documentation Producing ad hoc datasets and reports Take the first step towards your dream career  Every Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table. Here’s what we are looking for with this role: Essential Requirements:  Intermediate SQL & Python/R skills Education (Bachelor’s degree or higher) in Computer Science, Mathematics, or a related technical field, or equivalent practical experience Proven ability to work with varied data infrastructures – including relational databases, column stores, Json format You have professional experience. 1+ years of experience in Data or BI engineering dealing with large complex data scenarios Experience of ETL and data processing as well as experience working in an Agile environment and SCRUM methodologies Desirable requirements: Experience with data processing software (such as Hadoop, Spark, Pig, Hive), along with data processing algorithms (MapReduce, Flume) and with stream data processing tools such Kafka, RabbitMQ Experience with monitoring tools such Dynatrace, NewRelic, Splunk and with other NoSQL databases such MongoDB, Cassandra, HBase, and file-based storage solutions Salary starting from:  1 880 Euro/gross monthly Who we are   We believe that each of us has the power to make an impact. Job Title: Finance Internship Program for University Students
Job Description: Finance Internship Program  Bratislava, Slovakia Dell has been active in Slovakia since January 2003. We started as a centre of sales and customer support and transfer into a business centre supporting the whole EMEA region and the main financial hub of Dell, globally. We offer a broad palette of positions in IT, finance, sales, marketing, data science, technical support and business process support. We are very honored and humbled to receive 3rd place in an annual 'best employer' survey conducted by Profesia amongst Shared Service Centers in Slovakia for the year 2019. Join our team and be part of life at Dell. We have more than 110 interns working in various departments (marketing, finance, human resources, sales, information technology, data science, etc.) and we are looking for more enthusiasts to start their career at Dell. You will also be responsible for the following: Preparation of financial statements, internal tools & Microsoft Excel Working with financial data, analyzing it and preparation of outputs Reporting & presenting to higher management Extra trainings and development sessions What you can learn: You will have a unique opportunity to gain irreplaceable experience in practice Expand your horizons in the areas of financial planning, taxes, accounting & general finance acumen Collaborate with experts from multiple departments at global level We have a fulltime place for you after the internship You are our candidate if: Daily University Student in any Finance related field You are familiar with MS Office, especially MS Excel You have good presentation and communication skills English on fluent level Willing to work and open to flexibility What’s next? 1st step: short phone screening 2nd step: online video interview 3rd step: feedback and/or offer communication Hourly salary:   5.50 EUR per working hour Benefits When you join the Dell team as an intern you become part of a winning company that rewards you with following: Being part of a community of more than 110 interns at Dell Bratislava Access into Learning studio – more than 1,000 online trainings Dell Laptop Possibility to continue after your graduation in professional development programs Networking groups – collaboration, community and personal development (ERGs) #profesia Job ID: R165965 Dell’s Flexible & Hybrid Work Culture At Dell Technologies, we believe our best work is done when flexibility is offered. Job Title: 2024 校园招聘 商用客户内部销售实习生
Job Description: 2024  校园招聘   商用客户内部销售实习 生 即使在数字领域具有开创性的产品也不能做到自我销售。在戴尔，我们下定决心要为每一个客户及合作   伙伴提供高品质的一流体验。这种体验首先从我们开创性的技术产品组合开始，即客户端解决方案、高端电子设备、配件、移动产品、企业解决方案、服务和软件包。内部销售团队为我们的技术产品组合注入了活力。开发持久的关系、建立和谐的环境并依靠自身完美无瑕的交流技巧，通过电话、 Web 和电子邮件向客户销售产品，这是该团队引以为傲的资本 。 欢迎加入我们 [成都] 的 [内部销售 实习生 ] 在 [ 内部销售 ] 团队，您将与业界顶尖的人员一同共事并产生深远的社会影响 。 内部销售实习生将运用他们的交流技巧与行业知识，通过电话、 Web 和电子邮件向客户销售公司产品与服务，推动与合作伙伴的合作，最终实现产品解决方案的销售 。 关键职责 ： ·         学习团队合作以及跨部门沟通相关技能，了解和学习世界 500 强企业领先的管理方式、业务模式和跨团队协作技能 。 ·         学习 IT 前沿技术。包括但不限于： IT 数字化转型，云计算、大数据、人工智能，现代化数据中心基础架构等先进解决方案，学习主流解决方案 。 ·         提供客户开发至客户维护技能学习；优质的企业培训资源，帮助在时间管理、技能提升、职业规划管理上不断提 升 ·         管理客户信息，并通过电话和电子邮件等多种方式与客户建立联系，通过沟通来挖掘客户业务机 会 ·         通过团队合作赢取客户订单，并协调订单的交付，学习销售策略，掌握销售流程 。 基本要求 ： ·         良好的沟通能力和学习能 力 ·         对销售岗位高度热 忱 ·         2025  届本科及以上学历优 先 戴尔科技集团旗下拥有多家企业，面向客户提供各种创新技术和服务产品组合，旨在助力组织和个人构建数字化未来并实现工作、生活和娱乐方式转型。客户至上、互利共赢、积极创新、追求成效、诚信经营是我们的准则。加入我们独具魅力的大家庭，体验崇尚多元化和包容性的企业文化，享受颇具竞争力的薪酬、奖励方案、优厚福利以及宝贵的学习和发展机会，轻松拓展职业生涯。 了解 我们如何弥合多元化差距 。 截止日期： 2024 年 6 月  30 日 戴尔秉持所有员工工作机会平等的原则，致力于为员工提供 ⼀个无歧视、无骚扰的工作环境。戴尔的所有雇用决策基于业务需求、工作要求以及资历，与⺠族、肤色、宗教或信仰、国籍、出身或种族、性别（包括怀孕）、年龄、身体、精神或知觉障碍、 HIV 状况、性取向、性别认同和 / 或表达、婚姻、民事结合或同居伴侣关系状况、过去或现在的兵役、家族病史或遗传信息、家庭或 ⽗⺟状况或任何其他受我们运营地点的法律法规保护的状况无关。戴尔决不容忍基于任何上述特征的歧视或骚扰。单 击 此处 ，了解有关戴尔多元化和包容性文化的详细信息 Job ID: R228783 Dell’s Flexible & Hybrid Work Culture At Dell Technologies, we believe our best work is done when flexibility is offered. We know that freedom and flexibility are crucial to all our employees no matter where you are located and our flexible and hybrid work style allows team members to have the freedom to ideate, be innovative, and drive results their way. To learn more about our work culture, please visit our  locations  page.

Job Description: 即使在数字领域具有开创性的产品也不能做到自我销售。在戴尔，我们下定决心要为每一个客户及合作   伙伴提供高品质的一流体验。这种体验首先从我们开创性的技术产品组合开始，即客户端解决方案、高端电子设备、配件、移动产品、企业解决方案、服务和软件包。内部销售团队为我们的技术产品组合注入了活力。开发持久的关系、建立和谐的环境并依靠自身完美无瑕的交流技巧，通过电话、 Web 和电子邮件向客户销售产品，这是该团队引以为傲的资本 。 欢迎加入我们 [ 厦门 ] 的 [内部销售 实习生 ] 在 [ 内部销售 ] 团队，您将与业界顶尖的人员一同共事并产生深远的社会影响 。 内部销售实习生将运用他们的交流技巧与行业知识，通过电话、 Web 和电子邮件向客户销售公司产品与服务，推动与合作伙伴的合作，最终实现产品解决方案的销售 。 关键职责 ： ·         学习团队合作以及跨部门沟通相关技能，了解和学习世界 500 强企业领先的管理方式、业务模式和跨团队协作技能 。 ·         学习 IT 前沿技术。包括但不限于： IT 数字化转型，云计算、大数据、人工智能，现代化数据中心基础架构等先进解决方案，学习主流解决方案 。 ·         提供客户开发至客户维护技能学习；优质的企业培训资源，帮助在时间管理、技能提升、职业规划管理上不断提 升 ·         管理客户信息，并通过电话和电子邮件等多种方式与客户建立联系，通过沟通来挖掘客户业务机 会 ·         通过团队合作赢取客户订单，并协调订单的交付，学习销售策略，掌握销售流程 。 基本要求 ： ·         良好的沟通能力和学习能 力 ·         对销售岗位高度热 忱 ·         2025  届本科及以上学历优 先 戴尔科技集团旗下拥有多家企业，面向客户提供各种创新技术和服务产品组合，旨在助力组织和个人构建数字化未来并实现工作、生活和娱乐方式转型。客户至上、互利共赢、积极创新、追求成效、诚信经营是我们的准则。加入我们独具魅力的大家庭，体验崇尚多元化和包容性的企业文化，享受颇具竞争力的薪酬、奖励方案、优厚福利以及宝贵的学习和发展机会，轻松拓展职业生涯。 了解 我们如何弥合多元化差距 。 截止日期： 2024 年 6 月  30 日 戴尔秉持所有员工工作机会平等的原则，致力于为员工提供 ⼀个无歧视、无骚扰的工作环境。戴尔的所有雇用决策基于业务需求、工作要求以及资历，与⺠族、肤色、宗教或信仰、国籍、出身或种族、性别（包括怀孕）、年龄、身体、精神或知觉障碍、 HIV 状况、性取向、性别认同和 / 或表达、婚姻、民事结合或同居伴侣关系状况、过去或现在的兵役、家族病史或遗传信息、家庭或 ⽗⺟状况或任何其他受我们运营地点的法律法规保护的状况无关。戴尔决不容忍基于任何上述特征的歧视或骚扰。单 击 此处 ，了解有关戴尔多元化和包容性文化的详细信息 Job ID: R228547 Dell’s Flexible & Hybrid Work Culture At Dell Technologies, we believe our best work is done when flexibility is offered. We know that freedom and flexibility are crucial to all our employees no matter where you are located and our flexible and hybrid work style allows team members to have the freedom to ideate, be innovative, and drive results their way. To learn more about our work culture, please visit our  locations  page.

Job Description: 即使在数字领域具有开创性的产品也不能做到自我销售。在戴尔，我们下定决心要为每一个客户及合作   伙伴提供高品质的一流体验。这种体验首先从我们开创性的技术产品组合开始，即客户端解决方案、高端电子设备、配件、移动产品、企业解决方案、服务和软件包。内部销售团队为我们的技术产品组合注入了活力。开发持久的关系、建立和谐的环境并依靠自身完美无瑕的交流技巧，通过电话、 Web 和电子邮件向客户销售产品，这是该团队引以为傲的资本 。 欢迎加入我们 [大连] 的 [内部销售 实习生 ] 在 [ 内部销售 ] 团队，您将与业界顶尖的人员一同共事并产生深远的社会影响 。 内部销售实习生将运用他们的交流技巧与行业知识，通过电话、 Web 和电子邮件向客户销售公司产品与服务，推动与合作伙伴的合作，最终实现产品解决方案的销售 。 关键职责 ： ·         学习团队合作以及跨部门沟通相关技能，了解和学习世界 500 强企业领先的管理方式、业务模式和跨团队协作技能 。 ·         学习 IT 前沿技术。包括但不限于： IT 数字化转型，云计算、大数据、人工智能，现代化数据中心基础架构等先进解决方案，学习主流解决方案 。 ·         提供客户开发至客户维护技能学习；优质的企业培训资源，帮助在时间管理、技能提升、职业规划管理上不断提 升 ·         管理客户信息，并通过电话和电子邮件等多种方式与客户建立联系，通过沟通来挖掘客户业务机 会 ·         通过团队合作赢取客户订单，并协调订单的交付，学习销售策略，掌握销售流程 。 基本要求 ： ·         良好的沟通能力和学习能 力 ·         对销售岗位高度热 忱 ·         2025  届本科及以上学历优 先 戴尔科技集团旗下拥有多家企业，面向客户提供各种创新技术和服务产品组合，旨在助力组织和个人构建数字化未来并实现工作、生活和娱乐方式转型。客户至上、互利共赢、积极创新、追求成效、诚信经营是我们的准则。加入我们独具魅力的大家庭，体验崇尚多元化和包容性的企业文化，享受颇具竞争力的薪酬、奖励方案、优厚福利以及宝贵的学习和发展机会，轻松拓展职业生涯。 了解 我们如何弥合多元化差距 。 截止日期： 2024 年 6 月  30 日 戴尔秉持所有员工工作机会平等的原则，致力于为员工提供 ⼀个无歧视、无骚扰的工作环境。戴尔的所有雇用决策基于业务需求、工作要求以及资历，与⺠族、肤色、宗教或信仰、国籍、出身或种族、性别（包括怀孕）、年龄、身体、精神或知觉障碍、 HIV 状况、性取向、性别认同和 / 或表达、婚姻、民事结合或同居伴侣关系状况、过去或现在的兵役、家族病史或遗传信息、家庭或 ⽗⺟状况或任何其他受我们运营地点的法律法规保护的状况无关。戴尔决不容忍基于任何上述特征的歧视或骚扰。单 击 此处 ，了解有关戴尔多元化和包容性文化的详细信息 Job ID: R228438 Dell’s Flexible & Hybrid Work Culture At Dell Technologies, we believe our best work is done when flexibility is offered. We know that freedom and flexibility are crucial to all our employees no matter where you are located and our flexible and hybrid work style allows team members to have the freedom to ideate, be innovative, and drive results their way. Principal Systems Development Engineer  Our customers’ system requirements are usually highly complex. Bringing together hardware and software systems design, Systems Development Engineering operates at the very cutting edge of technology to meet them. Dell Technologies’ Integrated Solutions brings Dell and partner hardware and software products together in form of reference and validated designs. These designs paired with various services offers customers to embark the AI and GenAI journey with confidence, irrespective of their starting point in this transformational journey. Our solutions development engineers design and develop AI and GenAI solutions integrating GPU accelerated compute, network and storage products, in Slurm and Kubernetes clustered environments, allowing data scientists and developers to develop, fine tune, customize and deploy (for inference) AI models towards various use-cases and deployment environments (core, edge, cloud and anything in between). Join us to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact as a  Principal Systems Development Engineer  on our Systems Development Engineering Team in  Bangalore . What you’ll achieve As an Principal Systems Development Engineer, you will be responsible for the engineering work necessary to develop Dell Integrated Solutions based on the Generative AI-based compute, network, and storage infrastructure environment. You will use deep technical and industry expertise in AI to do the deployment, configuration and testing of AI workloads running on these infrastructures in a highly available and scalable clustered configurations. As a Principal Systems Development Engineer, you will design, define and implement complex system requirements for customers and prepare studies and analyses of existing systems. You will:  Create Architecture Designs, Write Engineering Functional, Development and Test Plans based on the Generative AI solution specifications and requirements. Set up and deploy the technical environment necessary to execute all solution developments and testing required, as specified in the Engineering Test Plans. Troubleshoot/Resolve technical issues and conduct technical review of all program deliverables prior to completing engineering work. Capture Engineering results to author technical content in form of Design Guide, Technical White Paper, Implementation Guide, Sizing Guide, and Technical Blogs. Initiate review and analysis of internally and externally facing engineering-specific  documentation with  stakeholders. Share innovation and technology knowledge gained from each project to help other engineering peers and leaders gain knowledge, help improve internal processes and future project decisions, and drive ideas for the streamlining and automation of future development work. Lead functional responsibilities of Generative AI solution projects.  Consistently communicates status of AI solution development work to relevant stakeholders, especially any issues that put the project timeline and/or quality as risk. Take the first step towards your dream career Every Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table. Here’s what we are looking for with this role: Essential Requirements:  8 to 10 years of related (AI, Computer Vision) experience architecting, developing and deploying end-to-end (infrastructure to platform to application to workload to use-cases) solutions. Strong knowledge of AI Technologies, including but not limited to Generative/Cognitive AI framework/models, Machine Learning/Deep Learning, AI platforms/libraries (Hugging Face, TensorFlow, etc.), and Open-Source ML framework (pytorch).  In depth knowledge of infrastructure deployment, including knowledge of  installation/configuration/troubleshooting  of Servers, Storage, and Networking, knowledge of Linux-based operating systems (deployment and configuration) and networking (IP addressing, subnets, VLANs, etc.). In depth knowledge of cluster management, including deploying and managing containers, Kubernetes and Slurm clusters. Desirable Requirements:  Engineering  or equivalent experience in Computer Science. Have outstanding communication skills and possess the ability to handle multiple simultaneous projects. Who we are We believe that each of us has the power to make an impact. That’s why we put our team members at the center of everything we do. If you’re looking for an opportunity to grow your career with some of the best minds and most advanced tech in the industry, we’re looking for you. Dell Technologies is a unique family of businesses that helps individuals and organizations transform how they work, live and play. Join us to build a future that works for everyone because Progress Takes All of Us. 2024 Campus   Product Operations Engineer When Dell Technologies launches new game-changing products into the global market, Product Operations Engineering has a vital role to play. The team coordinates all the operational activities that enable products to be introduced and sustained successfully. It’s about making sure there is consistency between production and test environments. It’s about ensuring hardware, software and networking changes are migrated into the production environment in a stable and controlled way. And it’s about creating build processes, coordinating product builds for release into production and setting up configuration specifications for releases. Join us to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact as a  Product Operations Engineer  on our  Global Operation  team in  Shanghai . What you’ll achieve As a Product Operations Engineer, you will be engaging to product design, global manufactory, drive strategies and action plans for new product introduction from early design to mass production. You will work with internal core team, extended team and suppliers on notebook developments throughout life of the program. You will: Develop & drive Operations readiness plans across factories to launch new products globally Execute product validation activities Utilizes metrics to improve new production, introduction process and product quality, at launch and throughout life of the program. Drives quality improvements by risk  assessment/mitigation  eliminating sources of defects in the design, supplier, new product introduction and manufacturing processes. Drives continuous improvement in process, product manufacturability, flexibility, and operations cycle time and quality; Drive product transition, sustain & excursion management Take the first step towards your dream career Every Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table. Job Title: Duales Studium Betriebswirtschaftslehre (Bachelor of Arts) Oktober 2024
Job Description: Duales Studium  Betriebswirtschaftslehre  (Bachelor of Arts) ab Oktober 2024 Praxisstandort Halle (Saale), Studienstandort Duale Hochschule Gera Technologie ist allgegenwärtig und verändert die Welt. Wir sind eines der größten IT-Unternehmen weltweit, welches sich zum Ziel gesetzt hat, Technologien zu entwickeln, die Menschen voranbringen und sie dazu befähigen ihr Potenzial voll auszuschöpfen. Du möchtest gern einen tieferen Einblick in die Abläufe eines großen Konzerns bekommen? Dann bist du bei Dell Technologies als  Top-Ausbildungsbetrieb  genau richtig! Job Title: MXDR Elite - Threat Hunter - Senior Advisor
Job Description: Secureworks (NASDAQ: SCWX) is a global cybersecurity leader that secures human progress with Secureworks® Taegis™, a SaaS-based, open XDR platform built on 20+ years of real-world threat intelligence and research, improving customers’ ability to detect advanced threats, streamline and collaborate on investigations, and automate the right actions. We enjoy competitive compensation and benefits packages, and reward and recognize our employees for exceptional results. A constant focus on continued learning and growth keeps our team members engaged and excited about “what’s next.” We offer flexible work options when available, and emphasize the importance of work-life balance. We know that when our people are rewarded, recognized, and rejuvenated, we win as a team. Role Overview The Threat Hunter is focused on protecting our Taegis ManagedXDR Elite customers by using a variety of tools and techniques to gather, classify, enrich, and tune suspicious and malicious activity. To accomplish this, the Triage Hunter must be able to research, evaluate, and stay current on emerging tools, techniques, and technologies. They are expected to act as a mentor, working side by-side with other personnel in an advisory, support, and training role to enhance security effectiveness & efficiency of the Security Operations Center (SOC). They will be leading security thought & innovation both internal to Secureworks and across the industry. Role Responsibilities: Review and Triage alerts from various platforms reporting into Taegis and determine whether they are benign or warrant further investigation. Create countermeasure tuning requests. Conduct Threat Hunts across the ManagedXDR Elite customer base using a variety of tools and methodologies. Contributes to the development of new techniques and plans within area of expertise. Continually learn and develop through awareness and study of information security events, techniques, and threat actor TTP’s. Assumes ownership in problem resolution striving for customer satisfaction. Proactively work to document and minimize operational and client impacting issues that arise during day-to-day operations. Develop  innovative and creative recommendations that improve customer outcomes. Provides mentorship to teammates guiding their career development. Actively contribute to internal projects per assignments received from the manager in alignment with own knowledge, skills, and workload. Capable of cross-organizational teaming in support of business advancement. Knowledge requirements Thorough understanding of Threat Hunting methodologies. Familiarity of Python, python data science modules and Jupyter Notebooks. Knowledge of adversarial attack methods and technologies. Knowledge and application of endpoint and network security. In-depth disciplinary knowledge combined with advanced experience. Advanced understanding of Security Devices. Advanced understanding of Application, Network & Operating System Security vulnerabilities. Preferred: GCIA, GCFA, OSCP or equivalent. Skills & Competencies 5-8 years of relevant experience or equivalent combination of education and work experience. BA/BS in engineering/computer science preferred. Excellent written and verbal communication skills with both technical and non-technical individuals. Self-Initiative and ability to successfully manage your time to meet the various demands of the role with minimal leadership oversight. Secureworks is committed to the principle of equal employment opportunity for all employees and to providing employees with a work environment free of discrimination and harassment. All employment decisions at Secureworks are based on business needs, job requirements and individual qualifications, without regard to race, color, religion or belief, national, social or ethnic origin, sex (including pregnancy), age, physical, mental or sensory disability, HIV status, sexual orientation, gender identity and/or expression, marital, civil union or domestic partnership status, past or present military service, family medical history or genetic information, family or parental status, or any other status protected by the laws or regulations in the locations where we operate. Secureworks will not tolerate discrimination or harassment based on any of these characteristics. Strategic Business Development Manager The  Strategic Supplier Partnership (SSP)  team is at the heart of Dell Global Operations and represents the voice of strategic suppliers. It supports executives to deepen the relationship with strategic partners, and deal with a wide range of initiatives including new business opportunities, new networks, or private-public partnership. Partnering with cross functional stakeholder teams at Dell and providing leadership with intelligence of developments in key supply chain and technology, we deliver recommendation that leads to business development opportunities to help achieve long-term growth objectives jointly with our supply chain partners. We thrive to keep Dell ahead of the curve by identifying and cultivating a partnership idea with strategic suppliers. Join us as a  Strategic Business Development Manager  on our  Strategic Supplier Partnership team  in Taipei to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact. What you’ll achieve Work with Dell leadership to realize strategic objectives with suppliers critical to Dell’s business Collect and turn the synthesized supplier feedback and industry intelligence into new business proposal to support Dell strategic priorities with supply chain partners Manage critical supplier relationship via regular meetings. Create and identify new industry networks Develop senior, cross-functional relationships and act as a program manager to priority initiatives and activities including supply chain decarbonization collaboration, supply chain resiliency initiatives and strategic response development for major market trend Produce communications and presentations as a deliverable to strategy projects. Support leadership to prepare collaterals for key supplier executive meetings, including content preparation, meeting management, supplier research etc. Take the first step towards your dream career Every Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table. Here’s what we are looking for with this role: Essential Requirements:                                                  Master degree in Business Administration, Management or related field of study, plus more than five years of experience. Or, equivalent experience as a strategist, analyst, consultant or equivalent at a top tier management consulting firm or in-house strategy team Excellent project management skills. Able to connect dots, have a strong sense of priority, methodical and logical thoughts process Demonstrate prior success in building relationships, influencing, relating and speaking to all the different stakeholders involved PowerPoint and Excel skills; proficiency using market research databases and industry reports; using network for intelligence. Proficiency in both written executive summary and verbal presentation in English and in Mandarin. Ability to work effectively across time zones Desirable Requirements Prior experience of managing customers/suppliers in the technology or semiconductor sector Prior experience in Energy industry or as a consultant in related field Who we are We believe that each of us has the power to make an impact. Software Engineer Intern     The Software Engineering team delivers next-generation application enhancements and new products for a changing world. Working at the cutting edge, we design and develop software for platforms, peripherals, applications and diagnostics — all with the most advanced technologies, tools, software engineering methodologies and the collaboration of internal and external partners. Join us as a  Software Engineer Intern   on our  Unstructured and Secondary Storage( USS)  Engineering  team in  Shanghai  to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact. What you’ll achieve Unstructured and Secondary Storage（USS） Division is in the business of transforming the way data is stored.  At the forefront of the big data movement, our highly parallelized, distributed architecture has completely redefined the storage model. The successful candidate of this position will start as an intern to work in USS Platform Engineering team, playing critical role in delivering cutting edge Storage Array Platform software. You will: Actively engage in Next GEN Platform development. Feature test and integration, issue/problem solving. Test development. Tools support and maintenance. Take the first step towards your dream career Every Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table. Here’s what we are looking for with this role: Essential Requirements Bachelor or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering or similar. Interest and passion in dealing with Hardware components (CPU, Memory, Drive and Peripheries). Experience/knowledge on software quality assurance and automation. Proficient in at least one programming language: C, C++, Python, Shell Familiar with Linux/Unix administration. Desirable Requirements A plus if you have knowledge and expertise in following areas: Storage protocols (NFS, CIFS, iSCSI/FC, SAS, NVMe, PCIe), storage technologies (SAN, NAS, RAID), networking, clustering. A plus if you have worked with HW platform testing (CPU, Memory, PCIe); HW component trouble shooting, integration; OS installation & upgrade. Experience with Git, Jenkins, JIRA.
